25 
26 class AutoDestroy
27 {
28 public :
29  virtual ~AutoDestroy() {}
30 };
31 
32 class GarbagePtr
33 {
34 private :
35  AutoDestroy *ptr;
36 public :
37  GarbagePtr(AutoDestroy *_ptr, GarbagePtr *_next) : ptr(_ptr), next(_next) {}
38  ~GarbagePtr() { delete ptr; }
39  GarbagePtr *next;
40 };
41 
42 class GarbageContainer
43 {
44 private :
45  GarbagePtr *root;
46 public :
47  GarbageContainer() : root(0) {}
48  virtual ~GarbageContainer() { while (0 != root) { GarbagePtr *temp = root; root = root->next; delete temp; } }
49  void reg(AutoDestroy *g) { root = new GarbagePtr(g, root); }
50 };
51 
52 //
53 // Utility to convert from WCHAR string to UTF8 string
54 //
55 class WCHARtoUTF8
56 {
57 public :
58  WCHARtoUTF8(const wchar_t *w_string) : utf8_string(0)
59  {
60  if (0 == w_string)
61  utf8_string = 0;
62  else
63  {
64  int string_len = 0;
65  while (w_string[string_len]) ++string_len;
66  char *ptr = utf8_string = new char[string_len * 3 + 1];
67  for (int w = *w_string; w != 0; w = *(++w_string))
68  {
69  // only support 16 bit unicode
70  int uw = w & 0xffff;
71  if (uw < 0x80)
72  *(ptr++) = (char)uw;
73  else if (uw < 0x800)
74  {
75  *(ptr++) = (char)(0xC0 | (uw >> 6));
76  *(ptr++) = (char)(0x80 | (uw & 0x3F));
77  }
78  else
79  {
80  *(ptr++) = (char)(0xE0 | (uw >> 12));
81  *(ptr++) = (char)(0x80 | ((uw >> 6) & 0x3F));
82  *(ptr++) = (char)(0x80 | (uw & 0x3F));
83  }
84  }
85  *ptr = 0;
86  }
87  }
88 
89  operator const char*()
90  {
91  return utf8_string;
92  }
93 
94  ~WCHARtoUTF8()
95  {
96  delete[] utf8_string;
97  }
98 
99 private :
100  char *utf8_string;
101 
102  //disable assignment
103  WCHARtoUTF8(const WCHARtoUTF8 &rhs);
104  WCHARtoUTF8 &operator=(const WCHARtoUTF8 &rhs);
105 };
106 
107 //
108 // Utility to convert from UTF8 string to WCHAR string
109 //
110 class UTF8toWCHAR
111 {
112 public :
113  UTF8toWCHAR(const char *utf8_string) : w_string(0)
114  {
115  if (0 == utf8_string)
116  w_string = 0;
117  else
118  {
119  int string_len = 0;
120  while (utf8_string[string_len]) ++string_len;
121  wchar_t *ptr = w_string = new wchar_t[string_len + 1];
122  for (int i = 0; i < string_len; ++i)
123  {
124  int c = utf8_string[i];
125  if (((c & 0xf0) == 0xe0) && (i + 2 < string_len))
126  {
127  *ptr = (wchar_t)(((c & 0xf) << 12) | ((utf8_string[++i] & 0x3f) << 6));
128  *ptr = (*ptr) | (utf8_string[++i] & 0x3f);
129  ++ptr;
130  }
131  else if (((c & 0xe0) == 0xc0) && (i + 1 < string_len))
132  *(ptr++) = (wchar_t)(((c & 0x1f) << 6) | ((utf8_string[++i] & 0x3f) << 6));
133  else
134  *(ptr++) = (wchar_t)c;
135  }
136 
137  *ptr = 0;
138  }
139  }
140 
141  operator const wchar_t*()
142  {
143  return w_string;
144  }
145 
146  ~UTF8toWCHAR()
147  {
148  delete[] w_string;
149  }
150 
151 private :
152  wchar_t *w_string;
153 
154  //disable assignment
155  UTF8toWCHAR(const UTF8toWCHAR &rhs);
156  UTF8toWCHAR &operator=(const UTF8toWCHAR &rhs);
157 };
158

199  static inline int metalColor(int c, int angle = 90) { return CChart_metalColor(c, angle); }
200  static inline int goldColor(int angle = 90) { return metalColor(0xffee44, angle); }
201  static inline int silverColor(int angle = 90) { return metalColor(0xdddddd, angle); }
202 
203  static inline int brushedMetalColor(int c, int texture = 2, int angle = 90) { return metalColor(c, angle) | ((texture & 0x3) << 18); }
204  static inline int brushedSilverColor(int texture = 2, int angle = 90) {return brushedMetalColor(0xdddddd, texture, angle); }
205  static inline int brushedGoldColor(int texture = 2, int angle = 90) {return brushedMetalColor(0xffee44, texture, angle); }

334  static inline int CrossShape(double width = 0.5)
335  { return CrossSymbol | (((int)(((width < 0) ? 0 : ((width > 1) ? 1 : width)) * 4095 + 0.5)) << 12); }
336  static inline int Cross2Shape(double width = 0.5)
337  { return Cross2Symbol | (((int)(((width < 0) ? 0 : ((width > 1) ? 1 : width)) * 4095 + 0.5)) << 12); }
338  static inline int PolygonShape(int side)
339  { return ChartDir_PolygonSymbol | (((side < 0) ? 0 : ((side > 100) ? 100 : side)) << 12); }
340  static inline int Polygon2Shape(int side)
341  { return ChartDir_Polygon2Symbol | (((side < 0) ? 0 : ((side > 100) ? 100 : side)) << 12); }
342  static inline int StarShape(int side)
343  { return ChartDir_StarSymbol | (((side < 0) ? 0 : ((side > 100) ? 100 : side)) << 12); }
344  static inline int ArrowShape(double angle = 0, double widthRatio = 1, double stemWidthRatio = 0.5, double stemLengthRatio = 0.5)
345  { return CChart_arrowShape(angle, widthRatio, stemWidthRatio, stemLengthRatio); }
346

427  static inline int StartOfSecondFilter(int labelStep = 1, double initialMargin = 0.05)
428  { return CChart_encodeFilter(ChartDir_StartOfSecondFilterTag, labelStep, initialMargin); }
429  static inline int StartOfMinuteFilter(int labelStep = 1, double initialMargin = 0.05)
430  { return CChart_encodeFilter(ChartDir_StartOfMinuteFilterTag, labelStep, initialMargin); }
431  static inline int StartOfHourFilter(int labelStep = 1, double initialMargin = 0.05)
432  { return CChart_encodeFilter(ChartDir_StartOfHourFilterTag, labelStep, initialMargin); }
433  static inline int StartOfDayFilter(int labelStep = 1, double initialMargin = 0.05)
434  { return CChart_encodeFilter(ChartDir_StartOfDayFilterTag, labelStep, initialMargin); }
435  static inline int StartOfWeekFilter(int labelStep = 1, double initialMargin = 0.05)
436  { return CChart_encodeFilter(ChartDir_StartOfWeekFilterTag, labelStep, initialMargin); }
437  static inline int StartOfMonthFilter(int labelStep = 1, double initialMargin = 0.05)
438  { return CChart_encodeFilter(ChartDir_StartOfMonthFilterTag, labelStep, initialMargin); }
439  static inline int StartOfYearFilter(int labelStep = 1, double initialMargin = 0.05)
440  { return CChart_encodeFilter(ChartDir_StartOfYearFilterTag, labelStep, initialMargin); }
441  static inline int RegularSpacingFilter(int labelStep = 1, int initialMargin = 0)
442  { return CChart_encodeFilter(ChartDir_RegularSpacingFilterTag, labelStep, initialMargin / 4095.0); }
443  static inline int AllPassFilter()
444  { return CChart_encodeFilter(ChartDir_AllPassFilterTag, 0, 0); }
445  static inline int NonePassFilter()
446  { return CChart_encodeFilter(ChartDir_NonePassFilterTag, 0, 0); }
447  static inline int SelectItemFilter(int item)
448  { return CChart_encodeFilter(ChartDir_SelectItemFilterTag, item, 0); }

549 // Class wrappers
551 
552 class TTFText
553 {
554 private :
555  //disable copying
556  TTFText(const TTFText &rhs);
557  TTFText &operator=(const TTFText &rhs);
558 
559  TTFTextInternal *ptr;
560 
561 public :
562  //obsoleted - for compatibility only
563  enum AntiAliasMode { NoAntiAlias, AntiAlias, AutoAntiAlias };
564  //obsoleted - for compatibility only
565  static void destroy(TTFText *t) { t->destroy(); }
566 
567  TTFText(TTFTextInternal *_ptr) : ptr(_ptr) {}
568  ~TTFText() { CTTFText_destroy(ptr); }
569  void destroy() { delete this; }
570 
571  int getWidth() const { return CTTFText_getWidth(ptr); }
572  int getHeight() const { return CTTFText_getHeight(ptr); }
573  int getLineHeight() const { return CTTFText_getLineHeight(ptr); }
574  int getLineDistance() const { return CTTFText_getLineDistance(ptr); }
575 
576  void draw(int x, int y, int color, int alignment = Chart::TopLeft) const
577  { CTTFText_draw(ptr, x, y, color, alignment); }
578 };
579 
580 
581 class DrawArea : public AutoDestroy
582 {
583 private :
584  //disable copying
585  DrawArea(const DrawArea &rhs);
586  DrawArea &operator=(const DrawArea &rhs);
587 
588  DrawAreaInternal *ptr;
589  bool own_this;
590 
591 public :
592  //obsoleted constants - for compatibility only
593  enum PaletteMode { TryPalette, ForcePalette, NoPalette };
594  //obsoleted constants - for compatibility only
595  enum DitherMethod { Quantize, OrderedDither, ErrorDiffusion };
596 
597  DrawArea() : ptr(CDrawArea_create()), own_this(true) {}
598  static DrawArea* create() { return new DrawArea(); }
599  DrawArea(DrawAreaInternal *_ptr) : ptr(_ptr), own_this(false) {}
600  ~DrawArea() { if (own_this) CDrawArea_destroy(ptr); }
601  void destroy() { delete this; }
602  DrawAreaInternal *getInternalPtr() { return ptr; }
603  const DrawAreaInternal *getInternalPtr() const { return ptr; }
604 
605  void enableVectorOutput() { CDrawArea_enableVectorOutput(ptr); }
606 
607  void setSize(int width, int height, int bgColor = 0xffffff)
608  { CDrawArea_setSize(ptr, width, height, bgColor); }
609  void resize(int newWidth, int newHeight, int filter = Chart::LinearFilter, double blur = 1)
610  { CDrawArea_resize(ptr, newWidth, newHeight, filter, blur); }
611  int getWidth() const { return CDrawArea_getWidth(ptr); }
612  int getHeight() const { return CDrawArea_getHeight(ptr); }
613  void setClipRect(int left, int top, int right, int bottom)
614  { CDrawArea_setClipRect(ptr, left, top, right, bottom); }
615  void setBgColor(int c) { CDrawArea_setBgColor(ptr, c); }
616 
617  void move(double xOffset, double yOffset, int bgColor = 0xffffff, int filter = Chart::LinearFilter,
618  double blur = 1) { CDrawArea_move(ptr, xOffset, yOffset, bgColor, filter, blur); }
619  void rotate(double angle, int bgColor = 0xffffff, double cx = -1, double cy = -1,
620  int filter = Chart::LinearFilter, double blur = 1)
621  { CDrawArea_rotate(ptr, angle, bgColor, cx, cy, filter, blur); }
622  void hFlip() { CDrawArea_hFlip(ptr); }
623  void vFlip() { CDrawArea_vFlip(ptr); }
624  void clone(DrawArea *d, int x, int y, int align, int newWidth = -1, int newHeight = -1,
625  int filter = Chart::LinearFilter, double blur = 1) const
626  { CDrawArea_clone(ptr, d->ptr, x, y, align, newWidth, newHeight, filter, blur); }
627 
628  void pixel(int x, int y, int c) { CDrawArea_pixel(ptr, x, y, c); }
629  int getPixel(int x, int y) const { return CDrawArea_getPixel(ptr, x, y); }
630 
631  void hline(int x1, int x2, int y, int c) { CDrawArea_hline(ptr, x1, x2, y, c); }
632  void vline(int y1, int y2, int x, int c) { CDrawArea_vline(ptr, y1, y2, x, c); }
633  void line(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2, int c, int lineWidth = 1)
634  { CDrawArea_line(ptr, x1, y1, x2, y2, c, lineWidth); }
635  void arc(int cx, int cy, int rx, int ry, double a1, double a2, int c)
636  { CDrawArea_arc(ptr, cx, cy, rx, ry, a1, a2, c); }
637 
638  void rect(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2, int edgeColor, int fillColor, int raisedEffect = 0)
639  { CDrawArea_rect(ptr, x1, y1, x2, y2, edgeColor, fillColor, raisedEffect); }
640  void polygon(const int *x, const int *y, int noOfPoints, int edgeColor, int fillColor)
641  { polygon(IntArray(x, noOfPoints), IntArray(y, noOfPoints), edgeColor, fillColor); }
642  void polygon(IntArray x, IntArray y, int edgeColor, int fillColor)
643  { CDrawArea_polygon2(ptr, x.data, x.len, y.data, y.len, edgeColor, fillColor); }
644  void polygon(DoubleArray x, DoubleArray y, int edgeColor, int fillColor)
645  { CDrawArea_polygon(ptr, x.data, x.len, y.data, y.len, edgeColor, fillColor); }
646  void surface(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2, int depthX, int depthY,
647  int edgeColor, int fillColor)
648  { CDrawArea_surface(ptr, x1, y1, x2, y2, depthX, depthY, edgeColor, fillColor); }
649  void sector(int cx, int cy, int rx, int ry, double a1, double a2, int edgeColor, int fillColor)
650  { CDrawArea_sector(ptr, cx, cy, rx, ry, a1, a2, edgeColor, fillColor); }
651  void cylinder(int cx, int cy, int rx, int ry, double a1, double a2,
652  int depthX, int depthY, int edgeColor, int fillColor)
653  { CDrawArea_cylinder(ptr, cx, cy, rx, ry, a1, a2, depthX, depthY, edgeColor, fillColor); }
654  void circle(int cx, int cy, int rx, int ry, int edgeColor, int fillColor)
655  { CDrawArea_circle(ptr, cx, cy, rx, ry, edgeColor, fillColor); }
656  void ringSector(int cx, int cy, int rx, int ry, int rx2, int ry2,
657  double a1, double a2, int edgeColor, int fillColor)
658  { CDrawArea_ringSector(ptr, cx, cy, rx, ry, rx2, ry2, a1, a2, edgeColor, fillColor); }
659  void ring(int cx, int cy, int rx, int ry, int rx2, int ry2, int edgeColor, int fillColor)
660  { CDrawArea_ring(ptr, cx, cy, rx, ry, rx2, ry2, edgeColor, fillColor); }
661 
662  void fill(int x, int y, int color) { CDrawArea_fill(ptr, x, y, color); }
663  void fill(int x, int y, int color, int borderColor) { CDrawArea_fill2(ptr, x, y, color, borderColor); }
664 
665  void text(const char *str, const char *font, double fontSize,
666  int x, int y, int color)
667  { CDrawArea_text(ptr, str, font, fontSize, x, y, color); }
668  void text(const wchar_t *str, const char *font, double fontSize,
669  int x, int y, int color)
670  { CDrawArea_textw(ptr, str, font, fontSize, x, y, color); }
671  void text(const char *str, const char *font, int fontIndex, double fontHeight, double fontWidth,
672  double angle, bool vertical, int x, int y, int color, int alignment = Chart::TopLeft)
673  { CDrawArea_text2(ptr, str, font, fontIndex, fontHeight, fontWidth, angle, vertical, x, y, color, alignment); }
674  void text(const wchar_t *str, const char *font, int fontIndex, double fontHeight, double fontWidth,
675  double angle, bool vertical, int x, int y, int color, int alignment = Chart::TopLeft)
676  { CDrawArea_text2w(ptr, str, font, fontIndex, fontHeight, fontWidth, angle, vertical, x, y, color, alignment); }
677  TTFText* text(const char *str, const char *font, double fontSize)
678  { return new TTFText(CDrawArea_text3(ptr, str, font, fontSize)); }
679  TTFText* text(const wchar_t *str, const char *font, double fontSize)
680  { return new TTFText(CDrawArea_text3w(ptr, str, font, fontSize)); }
681  TTFText* text(const wchar_t *_text, const char *font, int fontIndex,
682  double fontHeight, double fontWidth, double angle, bool vertical)
683  { return new TTFText(CDrawArea_text4w(ptr, _text, font, fontIndex, fontHeight, fontWidth, angle, vertical)); }
684  TTFText* text(const char *_text, const char *font, int fontIndex,
685  double fontHeight, double fontWidth, double angle, bool vertical)
686  { return new TTFText(CDrawArea_text4(ptr, _text, font, fontIndex, fontHeight, fontWidth, angle, vertical)); }
687  void close(TTFText *_text) { delete _text; }
688

690  { CDrawArea_merge(ptr, d->ptr, x, y, align, transparency); }
691  void tile(const DrawArea *d, int transparency)
692  { CDrawArea_tile(ptr, d->ptr, transparency); }

694  void setSearchPath(const char *path) { CDrawArea_setSearchPath(ptr, path); }
695  bool loadGIF(const char *filename) { return CDrawArea_loadGIF(ptr, filename); }
696  bool loadPNG(const char *filename) { return CDrawArea_loadPNG(ptr, filename); }
697  bool loadJPG(const char *filename) { return CDrawArea_loadJPG(ptr, filename); }
698  bool loadWMP(const char *filename) { return CDrawArea_loadWMP(ptr, filename); }
699  bool load(const char *filename) { return CDrawArea_load(ptr, filename); }

702  int bgColor = 0xffffff, int filter = Chart::LinearFilter, double blur = 1)
703  { CDrawArea_rAffineTransform(ptr, a, b, c, d, e, f, bgColor, filter, blur); }

705  int bgColor = 0xffffff, int filter = Chart::LinearFilter, double blur = 1)
706  { CDrawArea_affineTransform(ptr, a, b, c, d, e, f, bgColor, filter, blur); }

708  int filter = Chart::LinearFilter, double blur = 1)
709  { CDrawArea_sphereTransform(ptr, xDiameter, yDiameter, bgColor, filter, blur); }

714  int filter = Chart::LinearFilter, double blur = 1)

717  int filter = Chart::LinearFilter, double blur = 1)
718  { CDrawArea_vTriangleTransform(ptr, tHeight, bgColor, filter, blur); }

720  int filter = Chart::LinearFilter, double blur = 1)
721  { CDrawArea_hTriangleTransform(ptr, tWidth, bgColor, filter, blur); }

723  int filter = Chart::LinearFilter, double blur = 1)

727  int filter = Chart::LinearFilter, double blur = 1)
728  { CDrawArea_waveTransform(ptr, period, amplitude, direction, startAngle, longitudinal, bgColor, filter, blur); }

730  bool out(const char *filename) { return CDrawArea_out(ptr, filename); }
731 
732  bool outGIF(const char *filename) { return CDrawArea_outGIF(ptr, filename); }
733  bool outPNG(const char *filename) { return CDrawArea_outPNG(ptr, filename); }
734  bool outJPG(const char *filename, int quality = 80) { return CDrawArea_outJPG(ptr, filename, quality); }
735  bool outWMP(const char *filename) { return CDrawArea_outWMP(ptr, filename); }
736  bool outBMP(const char *filename) { return CDrawArea_outBMP(ptr, filename); }
737  bool outSVG(const char *filename, const char *options = 0) { return CDrawArea_outSVG(ptr, filename, options); }
738  bool outPDF(const char *filename) { return CDrawArea_outPDF(ptr, filename); }
739  bool outAGF(const char *filename) { return CDrawArea_outAGF(ptr, filename); }
740 
741  bool outGIF(const char **data, int *len) { return CDrawArea_outGIF2(ptr, data, len); }
742  bool outPNG(const char **data, int *len) { return CDrawArea_outPNG2(ptr, data, len); }
743  bool outJPG(const char **data, int *len, int quality = 80) { return CDrawArea_outJPG2(ptr, data, len, quality); }
744  bool outWMP(const char **data, int *len) { return CDrawArea_outWMP2(ptr, data, len); }
745  bool outBMP(const char **data, int *len) { return CDrawArea_outBMP2(ptr, data, len); }
746 
747  MemBlock outGIF() { const char *data; int len; outGIF(&data, &len); return MemBlock(data, len); }
748  MemBlock outPNG() { const char *data; int len; outPNG(&data, &len); return MemBlock(data, len); }
749  MemBlock outJPG(int quality = 80) { const char *data; int len; outJPG(&data, &len, quality); return MemBlock(data, len); }
750  MemBlock outWMP() { const char *data; int len; outWMP(&data, &len); return MemBlock(data, len); }
751  MemBlock outBMP() { const char *data; int len; outBMP(&data, &len); return MemBlock(data, len); }
752  MemBlock outSVG2(const char *options = 0)
753  { const char *data; int len; CDrawArea_outSVG2(ptr, &data, &len, options); return MemBlock(data, len); }
754  MemBlock outSVG() { return outSVG2(); }
755  MemBlock outPDF() { const char *data; int len; CDrawArea_outPDF2(ptr, &data, &len); return MemBlock(data, len); }
756  MemBlock outAGF() { const char *data; int len; CDrawArea_outAGF2(ptr, &data, &len); return MemBlock(data, len); }
757 
758  void setOutputOptions(const char *options) { CDrawArea_setOutputOptions(ptr, options); }

776  int dashLineColor(int color, int patternCode = Chart::DashLine)
777  { return CDrawArea_dashLineColor(ptr, color, patternCode); }

779  { return patternColor(IntArray(c, w * h), startX, startY); }

781  { return CDrawArea_patternColor(ptr, colorArray.data, colorArray.len, height, startX, startY); }

783  { return CDrawArea_patternColor2(ptr, filename, startX, startY); }

785  { return CDrawArea_gradientColor(ptr, startX, startY, endX, endY, startColor, endColor); }
786  int gradientColor(IntArray colorArray, double angle = 90, double scale = 1.0, int startX = 0, int startY = 0)
787  { return CDrawArea_gradientColor2(ptr, colorArray.data, colorArray.len, angle, scale, startX, startY); }
788  int gradientColor(const int *c, double angle = 90, double scale = 1, int startX = 0, int startY = 0)
789  { return CDrawArea_gradientColor2a(ptr, c, angle, scale, startX, startY); }
790  int linearGradientColor(int startX, int startY, int endX, int endY, int startColor, int endColor, bool periodic = false)
791  { return CDrawArea_linearGradientColor(ptr, startX, startY, endX, endY, startColor, endColor, periodic); }
792  int linearGradientColor(int startX, int startY, int endX, int endY, IntArray c, bool periodic = false)
793  { return CDrawArea_linearGradientColor2(ptr, startX, startY, endX, endY, c.data, c.len, periodic); }
794  int radialGradientColor(int cx, int cy, int rx, int ry, int startColor, int endColor, bool periodic = false)
795  { return CDrawArea_radialGradientColor(ptr, cx, cy, rx, ry, startColor, endColor, periodic); }
796  int radialGradientColor(int cx, int cy, int rx, int ry, IntArray c, bool periodic = false)
797  { return CDrawArea_radialGradientColor2(ptr, cx, cy, rx, ry, c.data, c.len, periodic); }
798 
799  int reduceColors(int colorCount, bool blackAndWhite = false)
800  { return CDrawArea_reduceColors(ptr, colorCount, blackAndWhite); }
801 
802  void setDefaultFonts(const char *normal, const char *bold = 0, const char *italic = 0,
803  const char *boldItalic = 0)
804  { CDrawArea_setDefaultFonts(ptr, normal, bold, italic, boldItalic); }
805  void setFontTable(int index, const char *font)
806  { CDrawArea_setFontTable(ptr, index, font); }
807 
808  //
809  // Ver 5.1
810  //
811  void initDynamicLayer()
812  { CDrawArea_initDynamicLayer(ptr); }
813  void removeDynamicLayer(bool keepOriginal = false)
814  { CDrawArea_removeDynamicLayer(ptr, keepOriginal); }
815 };
816 
817 
818 class DrawObj : public AutoDestroy
819 {
820 private :
821  //disable copying
822  DrawObj(const DrawObj &rhs);
823  DrawObj &operator=(const DrawObj &rhs);
824 
825  DrawObjInternal *ptr;
826 
827 public :
828  DrawObj(DrawObjInternal *_ptr) : ptr(_ptr) {}
829  void destroy() { delete this; }
830  DrawObjInternal *getInternalPtr() { return ptr; }
831 
832  void setZOrder(int z) { CDrawObj_setZOrder(ptr, z); }
833  void paint(DrawArea *d) { CDrawObj_paint(ptr, d->getInternalPtr()); }
834 };
835

837 class Box : public DrawObj
838 {
839 private :
840  //disable copying
841  Box(const Box &rhs);
842  Box &operator=(const Box &rhs);
843 
844  BoxInternal *ptr;
845 
846 public :
847  Box(BoxInternal *_ptr) : DrawObj(Box2DrawObj(_ptr)), ptr(_ptr) {}
848  ~Box() {}
849 
850  void setPos(int x, int y) { CBox_setPos(ptr, x, y); }
851  void setSize(int w, int h) { CBox_setSize(ptr, w, h); }
852  void setBackground(int color, int edgeColor = -1, int raisedEffect = 0)
853  { CBox_setBackground(ptr, color, edgeColor, raisedEffect); }
854  void setRoundedCorners(int r1 = 10, int r2 = -1, int r3 = -1, int r4 = -1)
855  { CBox_setRoundedCorners(ptr, r1, r2, r3, r4); }
856  int getLeftX() const { return CBox_getLeftX(ptr); }
857  int getTopY() const { return CBox_getTopY(ptr); }
858  int getWidth() const { return CBox_getWidth(ptr); }
859  int getHeight() const { return CBox_getHeight(ptr); }
860  const char *getImageCoor(int offsetX = 0, int offsetY = 0)
861  { return CBox_getImageCoor(ptr, offsetX, offsetY); }
862 };
863 
864 
865 class TextBox : public Box
866 {
867 private :
868  //disable copying
869  TextBox(const TextBox &rhs);
870  TextBox &operator=(const TextBox &rhs);
871 
872  TextBoxInternal *ptr;
873 
874 public :
875  TextBox(TextBoxInternal *_ptr) : Box(TextBox2Box(_ptr)), ptr(_ptr) {}
876  ~TextBox() {}
877 
878  void setText(const char *text) { CTextBox_setText(ptr, text); }
879  void setAlignment(int a) { CTextBox_setAlignment(ptr, a); }
880  void setFontStyle(const char *font, int fontIndex = 0)
881  { CTextBox_setFontStyle(ptr, font, fontIndex); }
882  void setFontSize(double fontHeight, double fontWidth = 0)
883  { CTextBox_setFontSize(ptr, fontHeight, fontWidth); }
884  void setFontAngle(double angle, bool vertical = false)
885  { CTextBox_setFontAngle(ptr, angle, vertical); }
886  void setFontColor(int color) { CTextBox_setFontColor(ptr, color); }
887  void setMargin(int m) { CTextBox_setMargin(ptr, m); }
888  void setMargin(int leftMargin, int rightMargin, int topMargin, int bottomMargin)
889  { CTextBox_setMargin2(ptr, leftMargin, rightMargin, topMargin, bottomMargin); }
890  void setWidth(int width) { CTextBox_setWidth(ptr, width); }
891  void setHeight(int height) { CTextBox_setHeight(ptr, height); }
892  void setMaxWidth(int maxWidth) { CTextBox_setMaxWidth(ptr, maxWidth); }
893  void setTruncate(int maxWidth, int maxLines = 1)
894  { CTextBox_setTruncate(ptr, maxWidth, maxLines); }
895 };

921 class CDMLTable : public DrawObj, protected GarbageContainer
922 {
923 private :
924  //disable copying
925  CDMLTable(const CDMLTable &rhs);
926  CDMLTable &operator=(const CDMLTable &rhs);
927 
928  CDMLTableInternal *ptr;
929 
930  TextBox *makeTextBox(TextBoxInternal *p)
931  { if (!p) return 0; TextBox *ret = new TextBox(p); reg(ret); return ret; }
932 
933 public :
934  CDMLTable(CDMLTableInternal *_ptr) : DrawObj(CDMLTable2DrawObj(_ptr)), ptr(_ptr) {}
935  ~CDMLTable() {}
936 
937  void setPos(int x, int y, int alignment = Chart::TopLeft)
938  { CCDMLTable_setPos(ptr, x, y, alignment); }
939 
940  TextBox *insertCol(int col) { return makeTextBox(CCDMLTable_insertCol(ptr, col)); }
941  TextBox *appendCol() { return makeTextBox(CCDMLTable_appendCol(ptr)); }
942  int getColCount() const { return CCDMLTable_getColCount(ptr); }
943 
944  TextBox *insertRow(int row) { return makeTextBox(CCDMLTable_insertRow(ptr, row)); }
945  TextBox *appendRow() { return makeTextBox(CCDMLTable_appendRow(ptr)); }
946  int getRowCount() const { return CCDMLTable_getRowCount(ptr); }
947 
948  TextBox *setText(int col, int row, const char *text)
949  { return makeTextBox(CCDMLTable_setText(ptr, col, row, text)); }
950  TextBox *setCell(int col, int row, int width, int height, const char *text)
951  { return makeTextBox(CCDMLTable_setCell(ptr, col, row, width, height, text)); }
952  TextBox *getCell(int col, int row)
953  { return makeTextBox(CCDMLTable_getCell(ptr, col, row)); }
954 
955  TextBox *getColStyle(int col) { return makeTextBox(CCDMLTable_getColStyle(ptr, col)); }
956  TextBox *getRowStyle(int row) { return makeTextBox(CCDMLTable_getRowStyle(ptr, row)); }
957  TextBox *getStyle() { return makeTextBox(CCDMLTable_getStyle(ptr)); }
958 
959  void layout() { CCDMLTable_layout(ptr); }
960 
961  int getColWidth(int col) const { return CCDMLTable_getColWidth(ptr, col); }
962  int getRowHeight(int row) const { return CCDMLTable_getRowHeight(ptr, row); }
963  int getWidth() const { return CCDMLTable_getWidth(ptr); }
964  int getHeight() const { return CCDMLTable_getHeight(ptr); }
965 };
966 
967 
968 class LegendBox : public TextBox
969 {
970 private :
971  //disable copying
972  LegendBox(const LegendBox &rhs);
973  LegendBox &operator=(const LegendBox &rhs);
974 
975  LegendBoxInternal *ptr;
976 
977 public :
978  LegendBox(LegendBoxInternal *_ptr) : TextBox(LegendBox2TextBox(_ptr)), ptr(_ptr) {}
979  ~LegendBox() {}
980 
981  void setCols(int noOfCols) { CLegendBox_setCols(ptr, noOfCols); }
982  void setReverse(bool b = true) { CLegendBox_setReverse(ptr, b); }
983  void setLineStyleKey(bool b = true) { CLegendBox_setLineStyleKey(ptr, b); }
984 
985  void addKey(const char *text, int color, int lineWidth = 0, const DrawArea *drawarea = 0)
986  { CLegendBox_addKey(ptr, text, color, lineWidth, drawarea ? drawarea->getInternalPtr() : 0); }
987  void addKey(int pos, const char *text, int color, int lineWidth = 0, const DrawArea *drawarea = 0)
988  { CLegendBox_addKey2(ptr, pos, text, color, lineWidth, drawarea ? drawarea->getInternalPtr() : 0); }
989  void setKeySize(int width, int height = -1, int gap = -1)
990  { CLegendBox_setKeySize(ptr, width, height, gap); }
991  void setKeySpacing(int keySpacing, int lineSpacing = -1)
992  { CLegendBox_setKeySpacing(ptr, keySpacing, lineSpacing); }
993  void setKeyBorder(int edgeColor, int raisedEffect = 0)
994  { CLegendBox_setKeyBorder(ptr, edgeColor, raisedEffect); }
995 
996  const char *getImageCoor(int dataItem, int offsetX = 0, int offsetY = 0)
997  { return CLegendBox_getImageCoor(ptr, dataItem, offsetX, offsetY); }
998  const char *getHTMLImageMap(const char *url, const char *queryFormat = 0, const char *extraAttr = 0,
999  int offsetX = 0, int offsetY = 0)
1000  { return CLegendBox_getHTMLImageMap(ptr, url, queryFormat, extraAttr, offsetX, offsetY); }
1001 };
1002 
1003 
1004 class BaseChart : protected GarbageContainer
1005 {
1006 private :
1007  //disable copying
1008  BaseChart(const BaseChart &rhs);
1009  BaseChart &operator=(const BaseChart &rhs);
1010 
1011  BaseChartInternal *ptr;
1012  int *refCount;
1013 
1014  DrawArea *drawAreaCache;
1015  DrawArea *regDrawArea(DrawAreaInternal *_ptr) {
1016  if (!_ptr) return 0;
1017  if ((0 == drawAreaCache) || (_ptr != drawAreaCache->getInternalPtr())) {
1018  drawAreaCache = new DrawArea(_ptr); reg(drawAreaCache);
1019  }
1020  return drawAreaCache;
1021  }
1022 
1023 public :
1024  //obsoleted constants - for compatibility only
1025  enum ImgFormat {PNG, GIF, JPG, WMP};
1026 
1027  BaseChart() : ptr(0), refCount(new int), drawAreaCache(0) { *refCount = 1; }
1028  BaseChart(BaseChart *rhs) : ptr(rhs->ptr), refCount(rhs->refCount), drawAreaCache(0) { ++(*refCount); }
1029  void init(BaseChartInternal *_ptr) { this->ptr = _ptr; }
1030  ~BaseChart() { if (--(*refCount) == 0) { CBaseChart_destroy(ptr); delete refCount; } }
1031  void destroy() { delete this; }
1032  BaseChartInternal *getInternalPtr() { return ptr; }
1033  const BaseChartInternal *getInternalPtr() const { return ptr; }
1034 
1035  void enableVectorOutput() { CBaseChart_enableVectorOutput(ptr); }
1036 
1038  // set overall chart
1040  void setSize(int width, int height) { CBaseChart_setSize(ptr, width, height); }
1041  int getWidth() const { return CBaseChart_getWidth(ptr); }
1042  int getHeight() const { return CBaseChart_getHeight(ptr); }
1043  void setBackground(int color, int edgeColor = Chart::Transparent, int raisedEffect = 0)
1044  { CBaseChart_setBackground(ptr, color, edgeColor, raisedEffect); }
1045  void setBorder(int color) //deprecated - use setBackground
1046  { CBaseChart_setBorder(ptr, color); }
1047  void setRoundedFrame(int extColor = 0xffffff, int r1 = 10, int r2 = -1, int r3 = -1, int r4 = -1)
1048  { CBaseChart_setRoundedFrame(ptr, extColor, r1, r2, r3, r4); }
1049  void setWallpaper(const char *img) { CBaseChart_setWallpaper(ptr, img); }
1050  void setBgImage(const char *img, int align = Chart::Center)
1051  { CBaseChart_setBgImage(ptr, img, align); }
1052  void setDropShadow(int color = 0xaaaaaa, int offsetX = 5, int offsetY = 0x7fffffff, int blurRadius = 5)
1053  { CBaseChart_setDropShadow(ptr, color, offsetX, offsetY, blurRadius) ; }
1054  void setThickFrame(int thickness, int frameColor = -1, int outerEdgeColor = -1, int innerEdgeColor = -1)
1055  { CBaseChart_setThickFrame(ptr, thickness, frameColor, outerEdgeColor, innerEdgeColor); }
1056 
1057  void setTransparentColor(int c)
1058  { CBaseChart_setTransparentColor(ptr, c); }
1059  void setAntiAlias(bool shapeAntiAlias = true, int textAntiAlias = Chart::AutoAntiAlias)
1060  { CBaseChart_setAntiAlias(ptr, shapeAntiAlias, textAntiAlias); }
1061  void setSearchPath(const char *path)
1062  { CBaseChart_setSearchPath(ptr, path); }
1063 
1064  TextBox *addTitle(const char *text, const char *font = 0, double fontSize = 12,
1065  int fontColor = Chart::TextColor, int bgColor = Chart::Transparent, int edgeColor = Chart::Transparent)
1066  { TextBox *ret = new TextBox(CBaseChart_addTitle(ptr, text, font, fontSize, fontColor, bgColor, edgeColor)); reg(ret); return ret;}
1067  TextBox *addTitle(int alignment, const char *text, const char *font = 0, double fontSize = 12,
1068  int fontColor = Chart::TextColor, int bgColor = Chart::Transparent, int edgeColor = Chart::Transparent)
1069  { TextBox *ret = new TextBox(CBaseChart_addTitle2(ptr, alignment, text, font, fontSize, fontColor, bgColor, edgeColor)); reg(ret); return ret; }
1070  LegendBox *addLegend(int x, int y, bool vertical = true, const char *font = 0,
1071  double fontSize = 10)
1072  { LegendBox *ret = new LegendBox(CBaseChart_addLegend(ptr, x, y, vertical, font, fontSize)); reg(ret); return ret; }
1073  LegendBox *addLegend2(int x, int y, int noOfCols, const char *font = 0, double fontSize = 10)
1074  { LegendBox *ret = new LegendBox(CBaseChart_addLegend2(ptr, x, y, noOfCols, font, fontSize)); reg(ret); return ret; }
1075  LegendBox *getLegend() { LegendBox *ret = new LegendBox(CBaseChart_getLegend(ptr)); reg(ret); return ret; }
1076 
1078  // drawing primitives
1080  DrawArea *getDrawArea() { return regDrawArea(CBaseChart_getDrawArea(ptr)); }
1081  TextBox *addText(int x, int y, const char *text, const char *font = 0, double fontSize = 8,
1082  int fontColor = Chart::TextColor, int alignment = Chart::TopLeft, double angle = 0, bool vertical = false)
1083  { TextBox *ret = new TextBox(CBaseChart_addText(ptr, x, y, text, font, fontSize, fontColor, alignment, angle, vertical)); reg(ret); return ret; }
1084  Line *addLine(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2, int color = Chart::LineColor, int lineWidth = 1)
1085  { Line *ret = new Line(CBaseChart_addLine(ptr, x1, y1, x2, y2, color, lineWidth)); reg(ret); return ret; }
1086  CDMLTable *addTable(int x, int y, int alignment, int col, int row)
1087  { CDMLTable *ret = new CDMLTable(CBaseChart_addTable(ptr, x, y, alignment, col, row)); reg(ret); return ret; }
1088  void addExtraField(StringArray texts) { CBaseChart_addExtraField(ptr, texts.data, texts.len); }
1089  void addExtraField(DoubleArray numbers) { CBaseChart_addExtraField2(ptr, numbers.data, numbers.len); }
1090 
1092  // color management methods
1094  void setColor(int paletteEntry, int color)
1095  { setColors(paletteEntry, IntArray(&color, 1)); }
1096  void setColors(int paletteEntry, const int *colors)
1097  { for (int i = 0; i < 0xffff; ++i) if (colors[i] == -1) { setColors(paletteEntry, IntArray(colors, i)); return; } }
1098  void setColors(int paletteEntry, IntArray colors)
1099  { CBaseChart_setColors(ptr, paletteEntry, colors.data, colors.len); }
1100  void setColors(const int *colors) { setColors(0, colors); }
1101  void setColors(IntArray colors) { setColors(0, colors); }
1102  int getColor(int paletteEntry) { return CBaseChart_getColor(ptr, paletteEntry); }
1103  int halfColor(int c) { return CBaseChart_halfColor(ptr, c); }
1104  int adjustBrightness(int c, double brightness) { return CBaseChart_adjustBrightness(ptr, c, brightness); }
1105 
1106  int dashLineColor(int color, int patternCode = Chart::DashLine)
1107  { return CBaseChart_dashLineColor(ptr, color, patternCode); }
1108  int patternColor(const int *c, int w, int h, int startX = 0, int startY = 0)
1109  { return patternColor(IntArray(c, w * h), startX, startY); }
1110  int patternColor(IntArray colorArray, int height, int startX = 0, int startY = 0)
1111  { return CBaseChart_patternColor(ptr, colorArray.data, colorArray.len, height, startX, startY); }
1112  int patternColor(const char *filename, int startX = 0, int startY = 0)
1113  { return CBaseChart_patternColor2(ptr, filename, startX, startY); }
1114  int gradientColor(int startX, int startY, int endX, int endY, int startColor, int endColor)
1115  { return CBaseChart_gradientColor(ptr, startX, startY, endX, endY, startColor, endColor); }
1116  int gradientColor(IntArray colorArray, double angle = 90, double scale = 1.0, int startX = 0, int startY = 0)
1117  { return CBaseChart_gradientColor2(ptr, colorArray.data, colorArray.len, angle, scale, startX, startY); }
1118  int gradientColor(const int *c, double angle = 90, double scale = 1, int startX = 0, int startY = 0)
1119  { return CBaseChart_gradientColor2a(ptr, c, angle, scale, startX, startY); }
1120  int linearGradientColor(int startX, int startY, int endX, int endY, int startColor, int endColor, bool periodic = false)
1121  { return CBaseChart_linearGradientColor(ptr, startX, startY, endX, endY, startColor, endColor, periodic); }
1122  int linearGradientColor(int startX, int startY, int endX, int endY, IntArray c, bool periodic = false)
1123  { return CBaseChart_linearGradientColor2(ptr, startX, startY, endX, endY, c.data, c.len, periodic); }
1124  int radialGradientColor(int cx, int cy, int rx, int ry, int startColor, int endColor, bool periodic = false)
1125  { return CBaseChart_radialGradientColor(ptr, cx, cy, rx, ry, startColor, endColor, periodic); }
1126  int radialGradientColor(int cx, int cy, int rx, int ry, IntArray c, bool periodic = false)
1127  { return CBaseChart_radialGradientColor2(ptr, cx, cy, rx, ry, c.data, c.len, periodic); }
1128 
1130  // locale support
1132  void setDefaultFonts(const char *normal, const char *bold = 0, const char *italic = 0,
1133  const char *boldItalic = 0)
1134  { CBaseChart_setDefaultFonts(ptr, normal, bold, italic, boldItalic); }
1135  void setFontTable(int index, const char *font)
1136  { CBaseChart_setFontTable(ptr, index, font); }
1137 
1138  void setNumberFormat(char thousandSeparator = '~', char decimalPointChar = '.', char signChar = '-')
1139  { CBaseChart_setNumberFormat(ptr, thousandSeparator, decimalPointChar, signChar); }
1140  void setMonthNames(StringArray names)
1141  { CBaseChart_setMonthNames(ptr, names.data, names.len); }
1142  void setWeekDayNames(StringArray names)
1143  { CBaseChart_setWeekDayNames(ptr, names.data, names.len); }
1144  void setAMPM(const char *am, const char *pm)
1145  { CBaseChart_setAMPM(ptr, am, pm); }
1146  const char *formatValue(double value, const char *formatString)
1147  { return CBaseChart_formatValue(ptr, value, formatString); }
1148 
1150  // chart creation methods
1152  LegendBox *layoutLegend() { LegendBox *ret = new LegendBox(CBaseChart_layoutLegend(ptr)); reg(ret); return ret; }
1153  void layout() { CBaseChart_layout(ptr); }
1154  bool makeChart(const char *filename)
1155  { return CBaseChart_makeChart(ptr, filename); }
1156  bool makeChart(int format, const char **data, int *len)
1157  { return CBaseChart_makeChart2(ptr, format, data, len); }
1158  MemBlock makeChart(int format)
1159  { const char *data; int len; makeChart(format, &data, &len); return MemBlock(data, len); }
1160  DrawArea *makeChart()
1161  { return regDrawArea(CBaseChart_makeChart3(ptr)); }
1162  void setOutputOptions(const char *options)
1163  { CBaseChart_setOutputOptions(ptr, options); }
1164 
1166  // image map support
1168  const char *getHTMLImageMap(const char *url, const char *queryFormat = 0, const char *extraAttr = 0,
1169  int offsetX = 0, int offsetY = 0)
1170  { return CBaseChart_getHTMLImageMap(ptr, url, queryFormat, extraAttr, offsetX, offsetY); }
1171  const char *getChartMetrics() { return CBaseChart_getChartMetrics(ptr); }
1172 
1173  //
1174  // Ver 5.1
1175  //
1176  int getAbsOffsetX() const
1177  { return CBaseChart_getAbsOffsetX(ptr); }
1178  int getAbsOffsetY() const
1179  { return CBaseChart_getAbsOffsetY(ptr); }
1180 
1181  DrawArea *initDynamicLayer()
1182  { return regDrawArea(CBaseChart_initDynamicLayer(ptr)); }
1183  void removeDynamicLayer()
1184  { CBaseChart_removeDynamicLayer(ptr); }
1185 
1186  const char *getJsChartModel(const char *options = 0)
1187  { return CBaseChart_getJsChartModel(ptr, options); }
1188 };
1189 
1190 
1191 class MultiChart : public BaseChart
1192 {
1193 private :
1194  //disable copying
1195  MultiChart(const MultiChart &rhs);
1196  MultiChart &operator=(const MultiChart &rhs);
1197 
1198  MultiChartInternal *ptr;
1199 
1200  const BaseChart *mainChart;
1201  BaseChart **charts;
1202  int chartCount;
1203  int maxChartCount;
1204 
1205 public :
1206  MultiChart(int width, int height, int bgColor = Chart::BackgroundColor,
1207  int edgeColor = Chart::Transparent, int raisedEffect = 0) :
1208  mainChart(0), charts(0), chartCount(0), maxChartCount(0)
1209  { ptr = CMultiChart_create(width, height, bgColor, edgeColor, raisedEffect);
1210  init(MultiChart2BaseChart(ptr)); mainChart = 0; }
1211  static MultiChart *create(int width, int height, int bgColor = Chart::BackgroundColor,
1212  int edgeColor = Chart::Transparent, int raisedEffect = 0)
1213  { return new MultiChart(width, height, bgColor, edgeColor, raisedEffect); }
1214  ~MultiChart() { delete[] charts; }
1215  void addChart(int x, int y, BaseChart *c) {
1216  if (0 != c) {
1217  CMultiChart_addChart(ptr, x, y, c->getInternalPtr());
1218  if (chartCount == maxChartCount) {
1219  maxChartCount = (maxChartCount < 10) ? 10 : maxChartCount * 2;
1220  BaseChart **temp = new BaseChart*[maxChartCount];
1221  for (int i = 0; i < chartCount; ++i) temp[i] = charts[i];
1222  delete[] charts; charts = temp;
1223  }
1224  charts[chartCount++] = c;
1225  }
1226  }
1227  BaseChart *getChart(int i = 0) {
1228  if (i == -1)
1229  return (BaseChart *)mainChart;
1230  if ((i >= 0) && (i < chartCount))
1231  return charts[i];
1232  return 0;
1233  }
1234  int getChartCount() {
1235  return chartCount;
1236  }
1237  void setMainChart(const BaseChart *c)
1238  { CMultiChart_setMainChart(ptr, c->getInternalPtr()); mainChart = c;}
1239 };
1240 
1241 
1242 class Sector : public AutoDestroy, protected GarbageContainer
1243 {
1244 private :
1245  //disable copying
1246  Sector(const Sector &rhs);
1247  Sector &operator=(const Sector &rhs);
1248 
1249  SectorInternal *ptr;
1250 
1251 public :
1252  Sector(SectorInternal *_ptr) : ptr(_ptr) {}
1253  ~Sector() {}
1254 
1255  void setExplode(int distance = -1)
1256  { CSector_setExplode(ptr, distance); }
1257  void setLabelFormat(const char *formatString)
1258  { CSector_setLabelFormat(ptr, formatString); }
1259  TextBox *setLabelStyle(const char *font = 0, double fontSize = 8,
1260  int fontColor = Chart::TextColor)
1261  { TextBox *ret = new TextBox(CSector_setLabelStyle(ptr, font, fontSize, fontColor)); reg(ret); return ret;}
1262  void setLabelPos(int pos, int joinLineColor = -1)
1263  { CSector_setLabelPos(ptr, pos, joinLineColor); }
1264  void setLabelLayout(int layoutMethod, int pos = -1)
1265  { CSector_setLabelLayout(ptr, layoutMethod, pos); }
1266  void setJoinLine(int joinLineColor, int joinLineWidth = 1)
1267  { CSector_setJoinLine(ptr, joinLineColor, joinLineWidth); }
1268  void setColor(int color, int edgeColor = -1, int joinLineColor = -1)
1269  { CSector_setColor(ptr, color, edgeColor, joinLineColor); }
1270  void setStyle(int shadingMethod, int edgeColor = -1, int edgeWidth = -1)
1271  { CSector_setStyle(ptr, shadingMethod, edgeColor, edgeWidth); }
1272  const char *getImageCoor(int offsetX = 0, int offsetY = 0)
1273  { return CSector_getImageCoor(ptr, offsetX, offsetY); }

1275  { return CSector_getLabelCoor(ptr, offsetX, offsetY); }

1279 class PieChart : public BaseChart
1280 {
1281 private :
1282  //disable copying
1283  PieChart(const PieChart &rhs);
1284  PieChart &operator=(const PieChart &rhs);
1285 
1286  PieChartInternal *ptr;
1287 
1288 public :
1289  PieChart(int width, int height, int bgColor = Chart::BackgroundColor,
1290  int edgeColor = Chart::Transparent, int raisedEffect = 0)
1291  { ptr = CPieChart_create(width, height, bgColor, edgeColor, raisedEffect);
1292  init(PieChart2BaseChart(ptr)); }
1293  static PieChart *create(int width, int height, int bgColor = Chart::BackgroundColor,
1294  int edgeColor = Chart::Transparent, int raisedEffect = 0)
1295  { return new PieChart(width, height, bgColor, edgeColor, raisedEffect); }
1296 
1297  void setPieSize(int x, int y, int r)
1298  { CPieChart_setPieSize(ptr, x, y, r); }
1299  void setDonutSize(int x, int y, int r, int r2)
1300  { CPieChart_setDonutSize(ptr, x, y, r, r2); }
1301  void set3D(int depth = -1, double angle = -1, bool shadowMode = false)
1302  { CPieChart_set3D(ptr, depth, angle, shadowMode); }
1303  void set3D(DoubleArray depths, double angle = 45, bool shadowMode = false)
1304  { CPieChart_set3D2(ptr, depths.data, depths.len, angle, shadowMode); }
1305  void setSectorStyle(int shadingMethod, int edgeColor = -1, int edgeWidth = -1)
1306  { CPieChart_setSectorStyle(ptr, shadingMethod, edgeColor, edgeWidth); }
1307  void setStartAngle(double startAngle, bool clockWise = true)
1308  { CPieChart_setStartAngle(ptr, startAngle, clockWise); }
1309  void setExplode(int sectorNo = -1, int distance = -1)
1310  { CPieChart_setExplode(ptr, sectorNo, distance); }
1311  void setExplodeGroup(int startSector, int endSector, int distance = -1)
1312  { CPieChart_setExplodeGroup(ptr, startSector, endSector, distance); }
1313 
1314  void setLabelFormat(const char *formatString)
1315  { CPieChart_setLabelFormat(ptr, formatString); }
1316  TextBox *setLabelStyle(const char *font = 0, double fontSize = 8,
1317  int fontColor = Chart::TextColor)
1318  { TextBox *ret = new TextBox(CPieChart_setLabelStyle(ptr, font, fontSize, fontColor)); reg(ret); return ret;}
1319  void setLabelPos(int pos, int joinLineColor = -1)
1320  { CPieChart_setLabelPos(ptr, pos, joinLineColor); }
1321  void setLabelLayout(int layoutMethod, int pos = -1, int topBound = -1, int bottomBound = -1)
1322  { CPieChart_setLabelLayout(ptr, layoutMethod, pos, topBound, bottomBound); }
1323  void setJoinLine(int joinLineColor, int joinLineWidth = 1)
1324  { CPieChart_setJoinLine(ptr, joinLineColor, joinLineWidth); }
1325  void setLineColor(int edgeColor, int joinLineColor = -1)
1326  { CPieChart_setLineColor(ptr, edgeColor, joinLineColor); }
1327 
1328  void setData(int noOfPoints, const double *data, const char* const* labels = 0)
1329  { setData(DoubleArray(data, noOfPoints), StringArray(labels, labels ? noOfPoints : 0)); }
1330  void setData(DoubleArray data, StringArray labels = StringArray())
1331  { CPieChart_setData(ptr, data.data, data.len, labels.data, labels.len); }
1332 
1333  Sector *getSector(int sectorNo)
1334  { SectorInternal *p = CPieChart_sector(ptr, sectorNo); if (!p) return 0;
1335  Sector *ret = new Sector(p); reg(ret); return ret; }
1336  Sector *sector(int sectorNo) { return getSector(sectorNo); }
1337 };

1409  void setTickColor(int majorTickColor, int minorTickColor = -1)
1410  { CAxis_setTickColor(ptr, majorTickColor, minorTickColor); }

1414  void setOffset(int x, int y) { CAxis_setOffset(ptr, x, y); }
1415

1417  void setTopMargin(int topMargin) //obsoleted - use setMargin(int, int)
1418  { setMargin(topMargin); }

1420  { CAxis_setMargin(ptr, topMargin, bottomMargin); }

1423  void setLabelOffset(double offset) { CAxis_setLabelOffset(ptr, offset); }
1424  void setLabelAlignment(int alignment, int minLabelSpace = 3)
1425  { CAxis_setLabelAlignment(ptr, alignment, minLabelSpace); }

1428  { CAxis_setAutoScale(ptr, topExtension, bottomExtension, zeroAffinity); }
1429  void setRounding(bool roundMin, bool roundMax)
1430  { CAxis_setRounding(ptr, roundMin, roundMax); }
1431  void setTickDensity(int majorTickSpacing, int minorTickSpacing = -1)
1432  { CAxis_setTickDensity(ptr, majorTickSpacing, minorTickSpacing); }
1433  void setReverse(bool b = true)
1434  { CAxis_setReverse(ptr, b); }
1435  void setMinTickInc(double inc) { CAxis_setMinTickInc(ptr, inc); }
1436 
1437  TextBox *setLabels(int noOfLabels, const char* const* text) //obsoleted - use setLabels(StringArray)
1438  { return setLabels(StringArray(text, noOfLabels)); }
1439  TextBox *setLabels(StringArray labels)
1440  { TextBox *ret = new TextBox(CAxis_setLabels(ptr, labels.data, labels.len)); reg(ret); return ret; }
1441  TextBox *setLabels(DoubleArray labels, const char *formatString = 0)
1442  { TextBox *ret = new TextBox(CAxis_setLabels2(ptr, labels.data, labels.len, formatString)); reg(ret); return ret; }
1443  CDMLTable *makeLabelTable()
1444  { CDMLTable *ret = new CDMLTable(CAxis_makeLabelTable(ptr)); reg(ret); return ret; }
1445  CDMLTable *getLabelTable()
1446  { CDMLTableInternal *p = CAxis_getLabelTable(ptr); if (!p) return 0;
1447  CDMLTable *ret = new CDMLTable(p); reg(ret); return ret; }
1448 
1449  void setLabelStep(int majorTickStep, int minorTickStep = 0, int majorTickOffset = 0, int minorTickOffset = -0x7fffffff)
1450  { CAxis_setLabelStep(ptr, majorTickStep, minorTickStep, majorTickOffset, minorTickOffset); }
1451 
1452  void setLinearScale(const char *formatString = 0)
1453  { CAxis_setLinearScale3(ptr, formatString); }
1454  void setLinearScale(double lowerLimit, double upperLimit, StringArray labels)
1455  { CAxis_setLinearScale2(ptr, lowerLimit, upperLimit, labels.data, labels.len); }
1456  void setLinearScale(double lowerLimit, double upperLimit, double majorTickInc = 0, double minorTickInc = 0)
1457  { CAxis_setLinearScale(ptr, lowerLimit, upperLimit, majorTickInc, minorTickInc); }
1458 
1459  void setLogScale(bool logScale) //obsoleted - use setLogScale(const char *)/setLinearScale(const char *)
1460  { if (logScale) setLogScale(); else setLinearScale(); }
1461 
1462  void setLogScale(const char *formatString = 0)
1463  { CAxis_setLogScale3(ptr, formatString); }
1464  void setLogScale(double lowerLimit, double upperLimit, StringArray labels)
1465  { CAxis_setLogScale2(ptr, lowerLimit, upperLimit, labels.data, labels.len); }
1466  void setLogScale(double lowerLimit, double upperLimit, double majorTickInc = 0, double minorTickInc = 0)
1467  { CAxis_setLogScale(ptr, lowerLimit, upperLimit, majorTickInc, minorTickInc); }
1468 
1469  void setDateScale(const char *formatString = 0)
1470  { CAxis_setDateScale3(ptr, formatString); }
1471  void setDateScale(double lowerLimit, double upperLimit, StringArray labels)
1472  { CAxis_setDateScale2(ptr, lowerLimit, upperLimit, labels.data, labels.len); }
1473  void setDateScale(double lowerLimit, double upperLimit, double majorTickInc = 0, double minorTickInc = 0)
1474  { CAxis_setDateScale(ptr, lowerLimit, upperLimit, majorTickInc, minorTickInc); }
1475 
1476  void syncAxis(const Axis *axis, double slope = 1, double intercept = 0)
1477  { CAxis_syncAxis(ptr, axis ? axis->ptr : 0, slope, intercept); }
1478  void copyAxis(const Axis *axis)
1479  { CAxis_copyAxis(ptr, axis ? axis->ptr : 0); }
1480 
1481  void addLabel(double pos, const char *label)
1482  { CAxis_addLabel(ptr, pos, label); }
1483 
1484  Mark *addMark(double value, int lineColor, const char *text = 0,
1485  const char *font = 0, double fontSize = 8)
1486  { Mark *ret = new Mark(CAxis_addMark(ptr, value, lineColor, text, font, fontSize)); reg(ret); return ret; }
1487  void addZone(double startValue, double endValue, int color)
1488  { CAxis_addZone(ptr, startValue, endValue, color); }
1489 
1490  int getCoor(double v) const { return CAxis_getCoor(ptr, v); }
1491  int getX() { return CAxis_getX(ptr); }
1492  int getY() { return CAxis_getY(ptr); }
1493  int getAlignment() { return CAxis_getAlignment(ptr); }
1494  double getMinValue() const { return CAxis_getMinValue(ptr); }
1495  double getMaxValue() const { return CAxis_getMaxValue(ptr); }
1496  int getThickness() const { return CAxis_getThickness(ptr); }
1497 
1498  DoubleArray getTicks() const
1499  { const double *d; int len; CAxis_getTicks(ptr, &d, &len); return DoubleArray(d, len); }
1500  const char *getLabel(double i) const { return CAxis_getLabel(ptr, i); }
1501  const char *getFormattedLabel(double v, const char *formatString = 0)
1502  { return CAxis_getFormattedLabel(ptr, v, formatString); }
1503 
1504  const char *getAxisImageMap(int noOfSegments, int mapWidth, const char *url, const char *queryFormat = 0,
1505  const char *extraAttr = 0, int offsetX = 0, int offsetY = 0) const
1506  { return CAxis_getAxisImageMap(ptr, noOfSegments, mapWidth, url, queryFormat, extraAttr, offsetX, offsetY); }
1507  const char *getHTMLImageMap(const char *url, const char *queryFormat = 0, const char *extraAttr = 0,
1508  int offsetX = 0, int offsetY = 0) const
1509  { return CAxis_getHTMLImageMap(ptr, url, queryFormat, extraAttr, offsetX, offsetY); }
1510 };
1511 
1512 //
1513 // for compatibility
1514 //
1515 typedef Axis BaseAxis;
1516 typedef BaseAxis XAxis;
1517 typedef BaseAxis YAxis;
1518 
1519 //
1520 // In this version, PolarChart RadialAxis is the same as the XYChart Axis
1521 //
1522 typedef Axis RadialAxis;
1523 
1524 //
1525 // AngularAxis for PolarChart
1526 //
1527 class AngularAxis : public AutoDestroy, protected GarbageContainer
1528 {
1529 private :
1530  //disable copying
1531  AngularAxis(const AngularAxis &rhs);
1532  AngularAxis &operator=(const AngularAxis &rhs);
1533 
1534  AngularAxisInternal *ptr;
1535 
1536 public :
1537  AngularAxis(AngularAxisInternal *_ptr) : ptr(_ptr) {}
1538  ~AngularAxis() {}
1539 
1540  TextBox *setLabelStyle(const char *font = "bold", double fontSize = 10,
1541  int fontColor = Chart::TextColor, double fontAngle = 0)
1542  { TextBox *ret = new TextBox(CAngularAxis_setLabelStyle(ptr, font, fontSize, fontColor, fontAngle)); reg(ret); return ret; }
1543  void setLabelGap(int d) { CAngularAxis_setLabelGap(ptr, d); }
1544 
1545  TextBox *setLabels(StringArray labels)
1546  { TextBox *ret = new TextBox(CAngularAxis_setLabels(ptr, labels.data, labels.len)); reg(ret); return ret; }
1547  TextBox *setLabels(DoubleArray labels, const char *formatString = 0)
1548  { TextBox *ret = new TextBox(CAngularAxis_setLabels2(ptr, labels.data, labels.len, formatString)); reg(ret); return ret; }
1549  void addLabel(double pos, const char *label)
1550  { CAngularAxis_addLabel(ptr, pos, label); }
1551 
1552  void setLinearScale(double lowerLimit, double upperLimit, StringArray labels)
1553  { CAngularAxis_setLinearScale2(ptr, lowerLimit, upperLimit, labels.data, labels.len); }
1554  void setLinearScale(double lowerLimit, double upperLimit, double majorTickInc = 0, double minorTickInc = 0)
1555  { CAngularAxis_setLinearScale(ptr, lowerLimit, upperLimit, majorTickInc, minorTickInc); }
1556 
1557  void addZone(double startValue, double endValue, double startRadius, double endRadius,
1558  int fillColor, int edgeColor = -1)
1559  { CAngularAxis_addZone(ptr, startValue, endValue, startRadius, endRadius, fillColor, edgeColor); }
1560  void addZone(double startValue, double endValue, int fillColor, int edgeColor = -1)
1561  { CAngularAxis_addZone2(ptr, startValue, endValue, fillColor, edgeColor); }
1562 
1563  const char *getAxisImageMap(int noOfSegments, int mapWidth, const char *url, const char *queryFormat = 0,
1564  const char *extraAttr = 0, int offsetX = 0, int offsetY = 0) const
1565  { return CAngularAxis_getAxisImageMap(ptr, noOfSegments, mapWidth, url, queryFormat, extraAttr, offsetX, offsetY); }
1566  const char *getHTMLImageMap(const char *url, const char *queryFormat = 0, const char *extraAttr = 0,
1567  int offsetX = 0, int offsetY = 0) const
1568  { return CAngularAxis_getHTMLImageMap(ptr, url, queryFormat, extraAttr, offsetX, offsetY); }
1569 };

1572 class ColorAxis : public Axis
1573 {
1574 private :
1575  //disable copying
1576  ColorAxis(const ColorAxis &rhs);
1577  ColorAxis &operator=(const ColorAxis &rhs);
1578 
1579  ColorAxisInternal *ptr;
1580 
1581 public :
1582  ColorAxis(ColorAxisInternal *_ptr) : Axis(ColorAxis2Axis(_ptr)), ptr(_ptr) {}
1583  ~ColorAxis() {}
1584 
1585  void setColorGradient(bool isContinuous = true, IntArray colors = IntArray(), int underflowColor = -1, int overflowColor = -1)
1586  { CColorAxis_setColorGradient(ptr, isContinuous, colors.data, colors.len, underflowColor, overflowColor); }
1587  virtual void setColorScale(DoubleArray colorStops, int underflowColor = -1, int overflowColor = -1)
1588  { CColorAxis_setColorScale(ptr, colorStops.data, colorStops.len, underflowColor, overflowColor); }
1589 
1590  void setAxisPos(int x, int y, int alignment) { CColorAxis_setAxisPos(ptr, x, y, alignment); }
1591  void setLevels(int maxLevels) { CColorAxis_setLevels(ptr, maxLevels); }
1592  void setCompactAxis(bool b = true) { CColorAxis_setCompactAxis(ptr, b); }
1593  void setAxisBorder(int edgeColor, int raisedEffect = 0) { CColorAxis_setAxisBorder(ptr, edgeColor, raisedEffect); }
1594  void setBoundingBox(int fillColor, int edgeColor = Chart::Transparent, int raisedEffect = 0)
1595  { CColorAxis_setBoundingBox(ptr, fillColor, edgeColor, raisedEffect); }
1596  void setBoxMargin(int m) { CColorAxis_setBoxMargin(ptr, m); }
1597  void setBoxMargin(int leftMargin, int rightMargin, int topMargin, int bottomMargin)
1598  { CColorAxis_setBoxMargin2(ptr, leftMargin, rightMargin, topMargin, bottomMargin); }
1599  void setRoundedCorners(int r1 = 10, int r2 = -1, int r3 = -1, int r4 = -1)
1600  { CColorAxis_setRoundedCorners(ptr, r1, r2, r3, r4); }
1601  int getBoxWidth() const { return CColorAxis_getBoxWidth(ptr); }
1602  int getBoxHeight() const { return CColorAxis_getBoxHeight(ptr); }
1603  int getColor(double z) const { return CColorAxis_getColor(ptr, z); }
1604 };

1606 
1607 class DataSet : public AutoDestroy, protected GarbageContainer
1608 {
1609 private :
1610  //disable copying
1611  DataSet(const DataSet &rhs);
1612  DataSet &operator=(const DataSet &rhs);
1613 
1614  DataSetInternal *ptr;
1615  Axis *useYAxisCache;
1616 
1617 public :
1618  DataSet(DataSetInternal *_ptr) : ptr(_ptr), useYAxisCache(0) {}
1619  ~DataSet() {}
1620  DataSetInternal *getInternalPtr() { return ptr; }
1621  const DataSetInternal *getInternalPtr() const { return ptr; }
1622 
1623  void setData(int noOfPoints, const double *data)
1624  { setData(DoubleArray(data, noOfPoints)); }
1625  void setData(DoubleArray data)
1626  { CDataSet_setData(ptr, data.data, data.len); }
1627  double getValue(int i )
1628  { return CDataSet_getValue(ptr, i); }
1629  double getPosition(int i )
1630  { return CDataSet_getPosition(ptr, i); }
1631 
1632  void setDataName(const char *name)
1633  { CDataSet_setDataName(ptr, name); }
1634  const char *getDataName()
1635  { return CDataSet_getDataName(ptr); }
1636  void setDataColor(int dataColor, int edgeColor = -1,
1637  int shadowColor = -1, int shadowEdgeColor = -1)
1638  { CDataSet_setDataColor(ptr, dataColor, edgeColor, shadowColor, shadowEdgeColor); }
1639  int getDataColor()
1640  { return CDataSet_getDataColor(ptr); }
1641 
1642  void setDataSymbol(int symbol, int size = 5, int fillColor = -1, int edgeColor = -1, int lineWidth = 1)
1643  { CDataSet_setDataSymbol(ptr, symbol, size, fillColor, edgeColor, lineWidth); }
1644  void setDataSymbol(const char *image)
1645  { CDataSet_setDataSymbol2(ptr, image); }
1646  void setDataSymbol(const DrawArea *obj)
1647  { CDataSet_setDataSymbol3(ptr, obj->getInternalPtr()); }
1648  void setDataSymbol(IntArray polygon, int size = 11, int fillColor = -1, int edgeColor = -1)
1649  { CDataSet_setDataSymbol4(ptr, polygon.data, polygon.len, size, fillColor, edgeColor); }
1650  void setSymbolOffset(int offsetX, int offsetY)
1651  { CDataSet_setSymbolOffset(ptr, offsetX, offsetY); }
1652 
1653  void setLineWidth(int w)
1654  { CDataSet_setLineWidth(ptr, w); }
1655 
1656  void setDataLabelFormat(const char *formatString)
1657  { CDataSet_setDataLabelFormat(ptr, formatString); }
1658  TextBox *setDataLabelStyle(const char *font = 0, double fontSize = 8,
1659  int fontColor = Chart::TextColor, double fontAngle = 0)
1660  { TextBox *ret = new TextBox(CDataSet_setDataLabelStyle(ptr, font, fontSize, fontColor, fontAngle)); reg(ret); return ret;}
1661 
1662  void setUseYAxis2(bool b = true) { CDataSet_setUseYAxis2(ptr, b); }
1663  void setUseYAxis(const Axis* a) { CDataSet_setUseYAxis(ptr, a->getInternalPtr()); }
1664  Axis *getUseYAxis() {
1665  AxisInternal *retPtr = CDataSet_getUseYAxis(ptr);
1666  if ((0 == useYAxisCache) || (retPtr != useYAxisCache->getInternalPtr())) {
1667  useYAxisCache = new Axis(retPtr); reg(useYAxisCache);
1668  }
1669  return useYAxisCache;
1670  }
1671 
1672  const char *getLegendIcon()
1673  { return CDataSet_getLegendIcon(ptr); }
1674 };
1675 
1676 
1677 class Layer : public AutoDestroy, protected GarbageContainer
1678 {
1679 private :
1680  //disable copying
1681  Layer(const Layer &rhs);
1682  Layer &operator=(const Layer &rhs);
1683 
1684  LayerInternal *ptr;
1685 
1686  DataSet **dataSetCache;
1687  int dataSetCacheCount;
1688  int maxDataSetCacheCount;
1689 
1690  DataSet *regDataSet(DataSetInternal *_ptr) {
1691  if (!_ptr) return 0;
1692  for (int i = 0; i < dataSetCacheCount; ++i)
1693  if (dataSetCache[i]->getInternalPtr() == _ptr) return dataSetCache[i];
1694  DataSet *ret = new DataSet(_ptr); reg(ret);
1695  if (dataSetCacheCount >= maxDataSetCacheCount) {
1696  maxDataSetCacheCount = (maxDataSetCacheCount < 10) ? 10 : maxDataSetCacheCount * 2;
1697  DataSet **temp = new DataSet*[maxDataSetCacheCount];
1698  for (int i = 0; i < dataSetCacheCount; ++i) temp[i] = dataSetCache[i];
1699  delete[] dataSetCache; dataSetCache = temp;
1700  }
1701  return dataSetCache[dataSetCacheCount++] = ret;
1702  }
1703 
1704 public :
1705  Layer(LayerInternal *_ptr) : ptr(_ptr), dataSetCache(0), dataSetCacheCount(0), maxDataSetCacheCount(0) {}
1706  ~Layer() { delete[] dataSetCache; }
1707  LayerInternal *getInternalPtr() { return ptr; }
1708  const LayerInternal *getInternalPtr() const { return ptr; }
1709 
1710  void moveFront(Layer *layer = 0) { CLayer_moveFront(ptr, layer ? layer->ptr : 0); }
1711  void moveBack(Layer *layer = 0) { CLayer_moveBack(ptr, layer ? layer->ptr : 0); }
1712 
1713  void set3D(int d = -1, int zGap = 0) { CLayer_set3D(ptr, d, zGap); }
1714  void setLineWidth(int w) { CLayer_setLineWidth(ptr, w); }
1715  void setBorderColor(int color, int lightingEffect = 0)
1716  { CLayer_setBorderColor(ptr, color, lightingEffect); }
1717  void setLegend(int m) { CLayer_setLegend(ptr, m); }
1718  void setLegendOrder(int dataSetOrder, int layerOrder = -1)
1719  { CLayer_setLegendOrder(ptr, dataSetOrder, layerOrder); }
1720  const char *getLegendIcon(int dataSetNo) const
1721  { return CLayer_getLegendIcon(ptr, dataSetNo); }
1722 
1723  //obsoleted constants - for compatibility only
1724  enum DataCombineMethod { Overlay, Stack, Depth, Side };
1725 
1726  void setDataCombineMethod(int m) { CLayer_setDataCombineMethod(ptr, m); }
1727  void setBaseLine(double baseLine) { CLayer_setBaseLine(ptr, baseLine); }
1728 
1729  DataSet *addDataSet(int noOfPoints, const double *d, int color = -1, const char *name = 0)
1730  { return addDataSet(DoubleArray(d, noOfPoints), color, name); }
1731  DataSet *addDataSet(DoubleArray data, int color = -1, const char *name = 0)
1732  { return regDataSet(CLayer_addDataSet(ptr, data.data, data.len, color, name)); }
1733  void addDataGroup(const char *name = 0) { CLayer_addDataGroup(ptr, name); }
1734  void addExtraField(StringArray texts) { CLayer_addExtraField(ptr, texts.data, texts.len); }
1735  void addExtraField(DoubleArray numbers) { CLayer_addExtraField2(ptr, numbers.data, numbers.len); }
1736 
1737  DataSet *getDataSet(int i)
1738  { return regDataSet(CLayer_getDataSet(ptr, i)); }
1739  DataSet *getDataSetByZ(int i)
1740  { return regDataSet(CLayer_getDataSetByZ(ptr, i)); }
1741  int getDataSetCount()
1742  { return CLayer_getDataSetCount(ptr); }
1743 
1744  void setUseYAxis2(bool b = true) { CLayer_setUseYAxis2(ptr, b); }
1745  void setUseYAxis(const Axis* a) { CLayer_setUseYAxis(ptr, a->getInternalPtr()); }
1746 
1747  void setXData(DoubleArray xData) { CLayer_setXData(ptr, xData.data, xData.len); }
1748  void setXData(double minValue, double maxValue) { CLayer_setXData2(ptr, minValue, maxValue); }
1749  double getXPosition(int i)
1750  { return CLayer_getXPosition(ptr, i); }
1751  double getNearestXValue(double target)
1752  { return CLayer_getNearestXValue(ptr, target); }
1753  int getXIndexOf(double xValue, double tolerance = 0)
1754  { return CLayer_getXIndexOf(ptr, xValue, tolerance); }
1755  void alignLayer(const Layer *layer, int dataSet) { CLayer_alignLayer(ptr, layer->getInternalPtr(), dataSet); }
1756 
1757  int getXCoor(double v) const { return CLayer_getXCoor(ptr, v); }
1758  int getYCoor(double v, bool yAxis = true) const { return CLayer_getYCoor(ptr, v, yAxis); }
1759  int getYCoor(double v, const Axis *yAxis) const
1760  { if (0 == yAxis) return getYCoor(v); else return CLayer_getYCoor2(ptr, v, yAxis->getInternalPtr()); }
1761  int xZoneColor(double threshold, int belowColor, int aboveColor)
1762  { return CLayer_xZoneColor(ptr, threshold, belowColor, aboveColor); }
1763  int yZoneColor(double threshold, int belowColor, int aboveColor, bool yAxis = true)
1764  { return CLayer_yZoneColor(ptr, threshold, belowColor, aboveColor, yAxis); }
1765  int yZoneColor(double threshold, int belowColor, int aboveColor, const Axis *yAxis)
1766  { if (0 == yAxis) return yZoneColor(threshold, belowColor, aboveColor);
1767  else return CLayer_yZoneColor2(ptr, threshold, belowColor, aboveColor, yAxis->getInternalPtr()); }
1768 
1769  //*** Note ***: The default value -0x7fffffff is maintained for compatibility
1770  const char *getImageCoor(int dataSet, int dataItem = -0x7fffffff, int offsetX = 0, int offsetY = 0)
1771  { return CLayer_getImageCoor(ptr, dataSet, dataItem, offsetX, offsetY); }
1772  const char *getImageCoor2(int dataItem, int offsetX = 0, int offsetY = 0)
1773  { return CLayer_getImageCoor2(ptr, dataItem, offsetX, offsetY); }
1774  const char *getHTMLImageMap(const char *url, const char *queryFormat = 0,
1775  const char *extraAttr = 0, int offsetX = 0, int offsetY = 0)
1776  { return CLayer_getHTMLImageMap(ptr, url, queryFormat, extraAttr, offsetX, offsetY); }
1777  void setHTMLImageMap(const char *url, const char *queryFormat = 0, const char *extraAttr = 0)
1778  { CLayer_setHTMLImageMap(ptr, url, queryFormat, extraAttr); }
1779 
1780  void setDataLabelFormat(const char *formatString)
1781  { CLayer_setDataLabelFormat(ptr, formatString); }
1782  TextBox *setDataLabelStyle(const char *font = 0, double fontSize = 8,
1783  int fontColor = Chart::TextColor, double fontAngle = 0)
1784  { TextBox *ret = new TextBox(CLayer_setDataLabelStyle(ptr, font, fontSize, fontColor, fontAngle)); reg(ret); return ret;}
1785 
1786  void setAggregateLabelFormat(const char *formatString)
1787  { CLayer_setAggregateLabelFormat(ptr, formatString); }
1788  TextBox *setAggregateLabelStyle(const char *font = 0, double fontSize = 8,
1789  int fontColor = Chart::TextColor, double fontAngle = 0)
1790  { TextBox *ret = new TextBox(CLayer_setAggregateLabelStyle(ptr, font, fontSize, fontColor, fontAngle)); reg(ret); return ret;}
1791 
1792  TextBox *addCustomDataLabel(int dataSet, int dataItem, const char *label,
1793  const char *font = 0, double fontSize = 8, int fontColor = Chart::TextColor, double fontAngle = 0)
1794  { TextBox *ret = new TextBox(CLayer_addCustomDataLabel(ptr, dataSet, dataItem, label, font, fontSize, fontColor, fontAngle)); reg(ret); return ret;}
1795  TextBox *addCustomAggregateLabel(int dataItem, const char *label, const char *font = 0,
1796  double fontSize = 8, int fontColor = Chart::TextColor, double fontAngle = 0)
1797  { TextBox *ret = new TextBox(CLayer_addCustomAggregateLabel(ptr, dataItem, label, font, fontSize, fontColor, fontAngle)); reg(ret); return ret;}
1798  TextBox *addCustomGroupLabel(int dataGroup, int dataItem, const char *label,
1799  const char *font = 0, double fontSize = 8, int fontColor = Chart::TextColor, double fontAngle = 0)
1800  { TextBox *ret = new TextBox(CLayer_addCustomGroupLabel(ptr, dataGroup, dataItem, label, font, fontSize, fontColor, fontAngle)); reg(ret); return ret;}
1801 };
1802

1805 {
1806 private :
1807  //disable copying

1811  BarLayerInternal *ptr;
1812

1815  ~BarLayer() {}
1816 
1817  void setBarGap(double barGap, double subBarGap = Chart::NoValue)
1818  { CBarLayer_setBarGap(ptr, barGap, subBarGap); }
1819  void setBarWidth(int barWidth, int subBarWidth = -1)
1820  { CBarLayer_setBarWidth(ptr, barWidth, subBarWidth); }
1821  void setMinLabelSize(int s)
1822  { CBarLayer_setMinLabelSize(ptr, s); }
1823  void setMinImageMapSize(int s)
1824  { CBarLayer_setMinImageMapSize(ptr, s); }
1825 
1826  void setBarShape(int shape, int dataGroup = -1, int dataItem = -1)
1827  { CBarLayer_setBarShape(ptr, shape, dataGroup, dataItem); }

1829  { CBarLayer_setBarShape2(ptr, shape.data, shape.len, dataGroup, dataItem); }
1830  void setRoundedCorners(int r1 = -0x7fffffff, int r2 = -0x7fffffff, int r3 = -0x7fffffff, int r4 = -0x7fffffff)
1831  { CBarLayer_setRoundedCorners(ptr, r1, r2, r3, r4); }
1832  void setIconSize(int height, int width = -1)
1833  { CBarLayer_setIconSize(ptr, height, width); }
1834  void setOverlapRatio(double overlapRatio, bool firstOnTop = true)
1835  { CBarLayer_setOverlapRatio(ptr, overlapRatio, firstOnTop); }
1836 };

1852  void setGapColor(int gapColor12, int gapColor21 = -1)
1853  { CInterLineLayer_setGapColor(ptr, gapColor12, gapColor21); }
1854 };
1855

1873  zDataY.data, zDataY.len, scaleTypeY); }
1874 
1875  void setGapColor(int lineColor, int lineWidth = -1)
1876  { CLineLayer_setGapColor(ptr, lineColor, lineWidth); }

1878  { CLineLayer_setImageMapWidth(ptr, width); }
1879  void setFastLineMode(bool b = true)
1880  { CLineLayer_setFastLineMode(ptr, b); }

1883 };

2134  { CPlotArea_setBackground2(ptr, img, align); }

2157 
2158 class XYChart : public BaseChart
2159 {
2160 private :
2161  //disable copying
2162  XYChart(const XYChart &rhs);
2163  XYChart &operator=(const XYChart &rhs);
2164 
2165  XYChartInternal *ptr;
2166 
2167  PlotArea *plotAreaCache;
2168  PlotArea *regPlotArea(PlotAreaInternal *_ptr) {
2169  if (!_ptr) return 0;
2170  if ((0 == plotAreaCache) || (_ptr != plotAreaCache->getInternalPtr())) {
2171  plotAreaCache = new PlotArea(_ptr); reg(plotAreaCache);
2172  }
2173  return plotAreaCache;
2174  }
2175 
2176  Layer **layerCache;
2177  int layerCacheCount;
2178  int maxLayerCacheCount;
2179  Layer *regLayer(LayerInternal *_ptr) {
2180  if (!_ptr) return 0;
2181  for (int i = 0; i < layerCacheCount; ++i)
2182  if (layerCache[i]->getInternalPtr() == _ptr) return layerCache[i];
2183  Layer *ret = new Layer(_ptr); reg(ret);
2184  if (layerCacheCount >= maxLayerCacheCount) {
2185  maxLayerCacheCount = (maxLayerCacheCount < 10) ? 10 : maxLayerCacheCount * 2;
2186  Layer **temp = new Layer*[maxLayerCacheCount];
2187  for (int i = 0; i < layerCacheCount; ++i) temp[i] = layerCache[i];
2188  delete[] layerCache; layerCache = temp;
2189  }
2190  return layerCache[layerCacheCount++] = ret;
2191  }
2192 
2193  Axis **axisCache;
2194  int axisCacheCount;
2195  int maxAxisCacheCount;
2196  Axis *regAxis(AxisInternal *_ptr) {
2197  if (!_ptr) return 0;
2198  for (int i = 0; i < axisCacheCount; ++i)
2199  if (axisCache[i]->getInternalPtr() == _ptr) return axisCache[i];
2200  Axis *ret = new Axis(_ptr); reg(ret);
2201  if (axisCacheCount >= maxAxisCacheCount) {
2202  maxAxisCacheCount = (maxAxisCacheCount < 10) ? 10 : maxAxisCacheCount * 2;
2203  Axis **temp = new Axis*[maxAxisCacheCount];
2204  for (int i = 0; i < axisCacheCount; ++i) temp[i] = axisCache[i];
2205  delete[] axisCache; axisCache = temp;
2206  }
2207  return axisCache[axisCacheCount++] = ret;
2208  }
2209 
2210 public :
2211  XYChart(int width, int height, int bgColor = Chart::BackgroundColor,
2212  int edgeColor = Chart::Transparent, int raisedEffect = 0) :
2213  plotAreaCache(0), layerCache(0), layerCacheCount(0), maxLayerCacheCount(0),
2214  axisCache(0), axisCacheCount(0), maxAxisCacheCount(0)
2215  { ptr = CXYChart_create(width, height, bgColor, edgeColor, raisedEffect);
2216  init(XYChart2BaseChart(ptr)); }
2217  static XYChart *create(int width, int height, int bgColor = Chart::BackgroundColor,
2218  int edgeColor = Chart::Transparent, int raisedEffect = 0)
2219  { return new XYChart(width, height, bgColor, edgeColor, raisedEffect); }
2220  ~XYChart() { delete[] layerCache; delete[] axisCache; }
2221 
2222  Axis *addAxis(int align, int offset) { return regAxis(CXYChart_addAxis(ptr, align, offset)); }
2223  Axis *yAxis() { return regAxis(CXYChart_yAxis(ptr)); }
2224  Axis *yAxis2() { return regAxis(CXYChart_yAxis2(ptr)); }
2225  void syncYAxis(double slope = 1, double intercept = 0)
2226  { CXYChart_syncYAxis(ptr, slope, intercept); }
2227  void setYAxisOnRight(bool b = true) { CXYChart_setYAxisOnRight(ptr, b); }
2228  Axis *xAxis() { return regAxis(CXYChart_xAxis(ptr)); }
2229  Axis *xAxis2() { return regAxis(CXYChart_xAxis2(ptr)); }
2230  void setXAxisOnTop(bool b = true) { CXYChart_setXAxisOnTop(ptr, b); }
2231  void swapXY(bool b = true) { CXYChart_swapXY(ptr, b); }
2232  void setAxisAtOrigin(int originMode = Chart::XYAxisAtOrigin, int symmetryMode = 0)
2233  { CXYChart_setAxisAtOrigin(ptr, originMode, symmetryMode); }
2234 
2235  int getXCoor(double v) const { return CXYChart_getXCoor(ptr, v); }
2236  int getYCoor(double v, const Axis *_yAxis = 0)
2237  { return CXYChart_getYCoor(ptr, v, (0 == _yAxis) ? 0 : _yAxis->getInternalPtr()); }
2238  double getXValue(int xCoor)
2239  { return CXYChart_getXValue(ptr, xCoor); }
2240  double getNearestXValue(double xCoor)
2241  { return CXYChart_getNearestXValue(ptr, xCoor); }
2242  double getYValue(int yCoor, const Axis *_yAxis = 0)
2243  { return CXYChart_getYValue(ptr, yCoor, (0 == _yAxis) ? 0 : _yAxis->getInternalPtr()); }
2244 
2245  int xZoneColor(double threshold, int belowColor, int aboveColor)
2246  { return CXYChart_xZoneColor(ptr, threshold, belowColor, aboveColor); }
2247  int yZoneColor(double threshold, int belowColor, int aboveColor, const Axis *_yAxis = 0)
2248  { return CXYChart_yZoneColor(ptr, threshold, belowColor, aboveColor, (0 == _yAxis) ? 0 : _yAxis->getInternalPtr()); }
2249 
2250  PlotArea *setPlotArea(int x, int y, int width, int height,
2251  int bgColor = Chart::Transparent, int altBgColor = -1, int edgeColor = -1,
2252  int hGridColor = 0xc0c0c0, int vGridColor = Chart::Transparent)
2253  { return regPlotArea(CXYChart_setPlotArea(ptr, x, y, width, height, bgColor, altBgColor, edgeColor, hGridColor, vGridColor)); }
2254  PlotArea *getPlotArea() { return regPlotArea(CXYChart_getPlotArea(ptr)); }
2255  void setClipping(int margin = 0) { CXYChart_setClipping(ptr, margin); }
2256  void setTrimData(int startPos, int len = 0x7fffffff) { CXYChart_setTrimData(ptr, startPos, len); }
2257 
2258  BarLayer *addBarLayer(int noOfPoints, const double *data, int color = -1, const char *name = 0, int depth = 0)
2259  { return addBarLayer(DoubleArray(data, noOfPoints), color, name, depth); }
2260  BarLayer *addBarLayer(DoubleArray data, int color = -1, const char *name = 0, int depth = 0)
2261  { BarLayer *ret = new BarLayer(CXYChart_addBarLayer(ptr, data.data, data.len, color, name, depth)); reg(ret); return ret; }
2262  BarLayer *addBarLayer(int noOfPoints, const double *data, const int *colors, const char* const* names = 0, int depth = 0)
2263  { return addBarLayer(DoubleArray(data, noOfPoints), IntArray(colors, colors ? noOfPoints : 0), StringArray(names, names ? noOfPoints : 0), depth); }
2264  BarLayer *addBarLayer(DoubleArray data, IntArray colors, StringArray names = StringArray(), int depth = 0)
2265  { BarLayer *ret = new BarLayer(CXYChart_addBarLayer3(ptr, data.data, data.len, colors.data, colors.len, names.data, names.len, depth)); reg(ret); return ret; }
2266  BarLayer *addBarLayer(int dataCombineMethod = Chart::Side, int depth = 0)
2267  { BarLayer *ret = new BarLayer(CXYChart_addBarLayer2(ptr, dataCombineMethod, depth)); reg(ret); return ret; }
2268

2270  { return addLineLayer(DoubleArray(data, noOfPoints), color, name, depth); }

2272  { LineLayer *ret = new LineLayer(CXYChart_addLineLayer(ptr, data.data, data.len, color, name, depth)); reg(ret); return ret; }

2276  AreaLayer *addAreaLayer(int noOfPoints, const double *data, int color = -1, const char *name = 0, int depth = 0)
2277  { return addAreaLayer(DoubleArray(data, noOfPoints), color, name, depth); }
2278  AreaLayer *addAreaLayer(DoubleArray data, int color = -1, const char *name = 0, int depth = 0)
2279  { AreaLayer *ret = new AreaLayer(CXYChart_addAreaLayer(ptr, data.data, data.len, color, name, depth)); reg(ret); return ret; }
2280  AreaLayer *addAreaLayer(int dataCombineMethod = Chart::Stack, int depth = 0)
2281  { AreaLayer *ret = new AreaLayer(CXYChart_addAreaLayer2(ptr, dataCombineMethod, depth)); reg(ret); return ret; }
2282 
2283  HLOCLayer *addHLOCLayer()
2284  { HLOCLayer *ret = new HLOCLayer(CXYChart_addHLOCLayer2(ptr)); reg(ret); return ret; }
2285  HLOCLayer *addHLOCLayer(int noOfPoints, const double *highData, const double *lowData, const double *openData = 0,
2286  const double *closeData = 0, int color = -1)
2287  { return addHLOCLayer(DoubleArray(highData, highData ? noOfPoints : 0), DoubleArray(lowData, lowData ? noOfPoints : 0),
2288  DoubleArray(openData, openData ? noOfPoints : 0), DoubleArray(closeData, closeData ? noOfPoints : 0), color); }
2289  HLOCLayer *addHLOCLayer(DoubleArray highData, DoubleArray lowData, DoubleArray openData = DoubleArray(),
2290  DoubleArray closeData = DoubleArray(), int color = -1)
2291  { HLOCLayer *ret = new HLOCLayer(CXYChart_addHLOCLayer(ptr, highData.data, highData.len,
2292  lowData.data, lowData.len, openData.data, openData.len, closeData.data, closeData.len, color)); reg(ret); return ret; }
2293  HLOCLayer *addHLOCLayer(DoubleArray highData, DoubleArray lowData, DoubleArray openData,
2294  DoubleArray closeData, int upColor, int downColor, int colorMode = -1, double leadValue = -1.7E308)

2296  lowData.data, lowData.len, openData.data, openData.len, closeData.data, closeData.len,
2297  upColor, downColor, colorMode, leadValue)); reg(ret); return ret; }
2298 
2299  CandleStickLayer *addCandleStickLayer(
2300  DoubleArray highData, DoubleArray lowData, DoubleArray openData, DoubleArray closeData,
2301  int riseColor = 0xffffff, int fallColor = 0x0, int edgeColor = Chart::LineColor)
2302  { CandleStickLayer *ret = new CandleStickLayer(CXYChart_addCandleStickLayer(ptr, highData.data, highData.len,
