2305 
2306  BoxWhiskerLayer *addBoxWhiskerLayer(
2307  DoubleArray boxTop, DoubleArray boxBottom, DoubleArray maxData = DoubleArray(), DoubleArray minData = DoubleArray(),
2308  DoubleArray midData = DoubleArray(), int fillColor = -1, int whiskerColor = Chart::LineColor, int edgeColor = -1)
2309  { BoxWhiskerLayer *ret = new BoxWhiskerLayer(CXYChart_addBoxWhiskerLayer(ptr, boxTop.data, boxTop.len,
2310  boxBottom.data, boxBottom.len, maxData.data, maxData.len, minData.data, minData.len, midData.data, midData.len,
2311  fillColor, whiskerColor, edgeColor)); reg(ret); return ret; }
2312  BoxWhiskerLayer *addBoxWhiskerLayer2(DoubleArray boxTop, DoubleArray boxBottom, DoubleArray maxData = DoubleArray(),
2313  DoubleArray minData = DoubleArray(), DoubleArray midData = DoubleArray(), IntArray fillColors = IntArray(),
2314  double whiskerBrightness = 0.5, StringArray names = StringArray())
2315  { BoxWhiskerLayer *ret = new BoxWhiskerLayer(CXYChart_addBoxWhiskerLayer2(ptr, boxTop.data, boxTop.len,
2316  boxBottom.data, boxBottom.len, maxData.data, maxData.len, minData.data, minData.len, midData.data, midData.len,
2317  fillColors.data, fillColors.len, whiskerBrightness, names.data, names.len)); reg(ret); return ret; }
2318  BoxWhiskerLayer *addBoxLayer(DoubleArray boxTop, DoubleArray boxBottom, int color = -1, const char *name = 0)
2319  { BoxWhiskerLayer *ret = new BoxWhiskerLayer(CXYChart_addBoxLayer(ptr, boxTop.data, boxTop.len,
2320  boxBottom.data, boxBottom.len, color, name)); reg(ret); return ret; }
2321 
2322  ScatterLayer *addScatterLayer(DoubleArray xData, DoubleArray yData, const char *name = 0,
2323  int symbol = Chart::SquareSymbol, int symbolSize = 5, int fillColor = -1, int edgeColor = -1)
2324  { ScatterLayer *ret = new ScatterLayer(CXYChart_addScatterLayer(ptr, xData.data, xData.len,
2325  yData.data, yData.len, name, symbol, symbolSize, fillColor, edgeColor)); reg(ret); return ret; }
2326 
2327  TrendLayer *addTrendLayer(DoubleArray data, int color = -1, const char *name = 0, int depth = 0)
2328  { TrendLayer *ret = new TrendLayer(CXYChart_addTrendLayer(ptr, data.data, data.len, color, name, depth)); reg(ret); return ret; }
2329  TrendLayer *addTrendLayer(DoubleArray xData, DoubleArray yData, int color = -1, const char *name = 0, int depth = 0)
2330  { TrendLayer *ret = new TrendLayer(CXYChart_addTrendLayer2(ptr, xData.data, xData.len,
2331  yData.data, yData.len, color, name, depth)); reg(ret); return ret; }
2332 
2333  SplineLayer *addSplineLayer(DoubleArray data = DoubleArray(), int color = -1, const char *name = 0)
2334  { SplineLayer *ret = new SplineLayer(CXYChart_addSplineLayer(ptr, data.data, data.len, color, name)); reg(ret); return ret; }
2335  StepLineLayer *addStepLineLayer(DoubleArray data = DoubleArray(), int color = -1, const char *name = 0)
2336  { StepLineLayer *ret = new StepLineLayer(CXYChart_addStepLineLayer(ptr, data.data, data.len, color, name)); reg(ret); return ret; }
2337 
2338  InterLineLayer *addInterLineLayer(LineObj *line1, LineObj *line2, int color12, int color21 = -1)
2339  { InterLineLayer *ret = new InterLineLayer(CXYChart_addInterLineLayer(ptr, (LineObjInternal *)line1, (LineObjInternal *)line2, color12, color21));
2340  reg(ret); return ret; }
2341 
2342  VectorLayer *addVectorLayer(DoubleArray xData, DoubleArray yData, DoubleArray lengths, DoubleArray directions,
2343  int lengthScale = Chart::PixelScale, int color = -1, const char *name = 0)
2344  { VectorLayer *ret = new VectorLayer(CXYChart_addVectorLayer(ptr, xData.data, xData.len,
2345  yData.data, yData.len, lengths.data, lengths.len, directions.data, directions.len, lengthScale, color, name));
2346  reg(ret); return ret; }
2347 
2348  ContourLayer *addContourLayer(DoubleArray xData, DoubleArray yData, DoubleArray zData)
2349  { ContourLayer *ret = new ContourLayer(CXYChart_addContourLayer(ptr, xData.data, xData.len, yData.data, yData.len, zData.data, zData.len));
2350  reg(ret); return ret; }
2351 
2352  Layer *getLayer(int i)
2353  { return regLayer(CXYChart_getLayer(ptr, i)); }
2354  Layer *getLayerByZ(int i)
2355  { return regLayer(CXYChart_getLayerByZ(ptr, i)); }
2356  int getLayerCount()
2357  { return CXYChart_getLayerCount(ptr); }
2358 
2359  void layoutAxes() { CXYChart_layoutAxes(ptr); }
2360  void packPlotArea(int leftX, int topY, int rightX, int bottomY, int minWidth = 0, int minHeight = 0)
2361  { CXYChart_packPlotArea(ptr, leftX, topY, rightX, bottomY, minWidth, minHeight); }
2362 };

2368 class ThreeDChart : public BaseChart
2369 {
2370 private :
2371  //disable copying
2372  ThreeDChart(const ThreeDChart &rhs);
2373  ThreeDChart &operator=(const ThreeDChart &rhs);
2374 
2375  ThreeDChartInternal *ptr;
2376 
2377 public :
2378  ThreeDChart() : ptr(0) {}
2379  void init(ThreeDChartInternal *_ptr) { this->ptr = _ptr; BaseChart::init(ThreeDChart2BaseChart(_ptr)); }
2380 
2381  void setPlotRegion(int cx, int cy, int xWidth, int yDepth, int zHeight)
2382  { CThreeDChart_setPlotRegion(ptr, cx, cy, xWidth, yDepth, zHeight); }
2383  void setViewAngle(double elevation, double rotation = 0, double twist = 0)
2384  { CThreeDChart_setViewAngle(ptr, elevation, rotation, twist); }
2385  void setPerspective(double perspective)
2386  { CThreeDChart_setPerspective(ptr, perspective); }
2387 
2388  Axis *xAxis() { Axis *ret = new Axis(CThreeDChart_xAxis(ptr)); reg(ret); return ret; }
2389  Axis *yAxis() { Axis *ret = new Axis(CThreeDChart_yAxis(ptr)); reg(ret); return ret; }
2390  Axis *zAxis() { Axis *ret = new Axis(CThreeDChart_zAxis(ptr)); reg(ret); return ret; }
2391  void setZAxisPos(int pos) { CThreeDChart_setZAxisPos(ptr, pos); }
2392 
2393  int getXCoor(double xValue, double yValue, double zValue)
2394  { return CThreeDChart_getXCoor(ptr, xValue, yValue, zValue); }
2395  int getYCoor(double xValue, double yValue, double zValue)
2396  { return CThreeDChart_getYCoor(ptr, xValue, yValue, zValue); }
2397 
2398  ColorAxis *setColorAxis(int x, int y, int alignment, int length, int orientation)
2399  { ColorAxis *ret = new ColorAxis(CThreeDChart_setColorAxis(ptr, x, y, alignment, length, orientation)); reg(ret); return ret; }
2400  ColorAxis *colorAxis()
2401  { ColorAxis *ret = new ColorAxis(CThreeDChart_colorAxis(ptr)); reg(ret); return ret; }
2402 
2403  void setWallVisibility(bool xyVisible, bool yzVisible, bool zxVisible)
2404  { CThreeDChart_setWallVisibility(ptr, xyVisible, yzVisible, zxVisible); }
2405  void setWallColor(int xyColor, int yzColor = -1, int zxColor = -1, int borderColor = -1)
2406  { CThreeDChart_setWallColor(ptr, xyColor, yzColor, zxColor, borderColor); }
2407  void setWallThickness(int xyThickness, int yzThickness = -1, int zxThickness = -1)
2408  { CThreeDChart_setWallThickness(ptr, xyThickness, yzThickness, zxThickness); }
2409  void setWallGrid(int majorXGridColor, int majorYGridColor = -1, int majorZGridColor = -1,
2410  int minorXGridColor = -1, int minorYGridColor = -1, int minorZGridColor = -1)
2411  { CThreeDChart_setWallGrid(ptr, majorXGridColor, majorYGridColor, majorZGridColor, minorXGridColor, minorYGridColor, minorZGridColor); }
2412 };

2520  { CPolarLayer_setData(ptr, data.data, data.len, color, name); }

2522  { CPolarLayer_setAngles(ptr, angles.data, angles.len); }

2530  int fillColor = -1, int edgeColor = -1, int lineWidth = 1)
2531  { CPolarLayer_setDataSymbol(ptr, symbol, size, fillColor, edgeColor, lineWidth); }

2533  int edgeColor = -1)

2545  { return CPolarLayer_getHTMLImageMap(ptr, url, queryFormat, extraAttr, offsetX, offsetY); }

2547  { CPolarLayer_setHTMLImageMap(ptr, url, queryFormat, extraAttr); }

2552  int fontColor = Chart::TextColor, double fontAngle = 0)
2553  { TextBox *ret = new TextBox(CPolarLayer_setDataLabelStyle(ptr, font, fontSize, fontColor, fontAngle)); reg(ret); return ret;}

2663  int edgeColor = Chart::Transparent, int raisedEffect = 0)
2664  { ptr = CPolarChart_create(width, height, bgColor, edgeColor, raisedEffect);
2665  init(PolarChart2BaseChart(ptr)); }

2667  int edgeColor = Chart::Transparent, int raisedEffect = 0)
2668  { return new PolarChart(width, height, bgColor, edgeColor, raisedEffect); }

2671  int edgeColor = Chart::Transparent, int edgeWidth = 1)
2672  { CPolarChart_setPlotArea(ptr, x, y, r, bgColor, edgeColor, edgeWidth); }

2674  { CPolarChart_setPlotAreaBg(ptr, bgColor1, bgColor2, altRings); }

2676  int aGridWidth = 1)
2677  { CPolarChart_setGridColor(ptr, rGridColor, rGridWidth, aGridColor, aGridWidth); }
2678  void setGridStyle(bool polygonGrid, bool gridOnTop = true)
2679  { CPolarChart_setGridStyle(ptr, polygonGrid, gridOnTop); }
2680  void setStartAngle(double startAngle, bool clockwise = true)
2681  { CPolarChart_setStartAngle(ptr, startAngle, clockwise); }
2682 
2683  AngularAxis *angularAxis() { AngularAxis *ret = new AngularAxis(CPolarChart_angularAxis(ptr)); reg(ret); return ret; }
2684  RadialAxis *radialAxis() { RadialAxis *ret = new RadialAxis(CPolarChart_radialAxis(ptr)); reg(ret); return ret; }
2685 
2686  int getXCoor(double r, double a) const { return CPolarChart_getXCoor(ptr, r, a); }
2687  int getYCoor(double r, double a) const { return CPolarChart_getYCoor(ptr, r, a); }
2688

2690  { PolarAreaLayer *ret = new PolarAreaLayer(CPolarChart_addAreaLayer(ptr, data.data, data.len, color, name)); reg(ret); return ret; }

2692  { PolarLineLayer *ret = new PolarLineLayer(CPolarChart_addLineLayer(ptr, data.data, data.len, color, name)); reg(ret); return ret; }

2694  { PolarSplineLineLayer *ret = new PolarSplineLineLayer(CPolarChart_addSplineLineLayer(ptr, data.data, data.len, color, name)); reg(ret); return ret; }

2696  { PolarSplineAreaLayer *ret = new PolarSplineAreaLayer(CPolarChart_addSplineAreaLayer(ptr, data.data, data.len, color, name)); reg(ret); return ret; }

2719  { TextBox *ret = new TextBox(CPyramidLayer_setCenterLabel(ptr, labelTemplate, font, fontSize, fontColor)); reg(ret); return ret; }
2720  TextBox *setRightLabel(const char *labelTemplate = "{skip}", const char *font = "{skip}", double fontSize = -1, int fontColor = -1)
2721  { TextBox *ret = new TextBox(CPyramidLayer_setRightLabel(ptr, labelTemplate, font, fontSize, fontColor)); reg(ret); return ret; }
2722  TextBox *setLeftLabel(const char *labelTemplate = "{skip}", const char *font = "{skip}", double fontSize = -1, int fontColor = -1)
2723  { TextBox *ret = new TextBox(CPyramidLayer_setLeftLabel(ptr, labelTemplate, font, fontSize, fontColor)); reg(ret); return ret; }
2724 
2725  void setColor(int color)
2726  { CPyramidLayer_setColor(ptr, color); }
2727  void setJoinLine(int color , int width = -1)
2728  { CPyramidLayer_setJoinLine(ptr, color, width); }
2729  void setJoinLineGap(int pyramidGap, int pyramidMargin = -0x7fffffff, int textGap = -0x7fffffff)
2730  { CPyramidLayer_setJoinLineGap(ptr, pyramidGap, pyramidMargin, textGap); }
2731  void setLayerBorder(int color, int width = -1)
2732  { CPyramidLayer_setLayerBorder(ptr, color, width); }
2733  void setLayerGap(double layerGap)
2734  { CPyramidLayer_setLayerGap(ptr, layerGap); }
2735 };

2756  { CPyramidChart_setConeSize(ptr, cx, cy, radius, height); }

2760  { CPyramidChart_setData(ptr, data.data, data.len, labels.data, labels.len); }

2762  { TextBox *ret = new TextBox(CPyramidChart_setCenterLabel(ptr, labelTemplate, font, fontSize, fontColor)); reg(ret); return ret; }

2774  { CPyramidChart_setGradientShading(ptr, startBrightness, endBrightness); }

2776  { CPyramidChart_setLighting(ptr, ambientIntensity, diffuseIntensity, specularIntensity, shininess); }

2779  { CPyramidChart_setJoinLine(ptr, color, width); }

2787  PyramidLayer *getLayer(int layerNo)
2788  { PyramidLayerInternal *p = CPyramidChart_getLayer(ptr, layerNo); if (!p) return 0;
2789  PyramidLayer *ret = new PyramidLayer(p); reg(ret); return ret; }

2793 class TreeMapNode: public AutoDestroy, protected GarbageContainer
2794 {
2795 private :
2796  //disable copying
2797  TreeMapNode(const TreeMapNode &rhs);
2798  TreeMapNode &operator=(const TreeMapNode &rhs);
2799 
2800  TreeMapNodeInternal *ptr;
2801 
2802 public :
2803  TreeMapNode(TreeMapNodeInternal *_ptr) : ptr(_ptr) {}
2804  ~TreeMapNode() {}
2805

2807  { CTreeMapNode_setData(ptr, data.data, data.len, labels.data, labels.len, colors.data, colors.len); }
2808  void addExtraField(StringArray texts)
2809  { CTreeMapNode_addExtraField(ptr, texts.data, texts.len); }
2810  void addExtraField(DoubleArray numbers)
2811  { CTreeMapNode_addExtraField2(ptr, numbers.data, numbers.len); }
2812 
2813  void setColors(int fillColor, int edgeColor = -1, int raisedEffect = -0x7fffffff)
2814  { CTreeMapNode_setColors(ptr, fillColor, edgeColor, raisedEffect); }

2816  int fontColor = Chart::TextColor, int alignment = Chart::TopLeft)
2817  { TextBox *ret = new TextBox(CTreeMapNode_setLabelFormat(ptr, format, font, fontSize, fontColor, alignment)); reg(ret); return ret; }
2818 
2819  void setLayoutMethod(int layoutMethod, int layoutDirection = Chart::TopLeft, int swapXY = 0)
2820  { CTreeMapNode_setLayoutMethod(ptr, layoutMethod, layoutDirection, swapXY); }
2821  void setLayoutAspectRatio(double ratio)
2822  { CTreeMapNode_setLayoutAspectRatio(ptr, ratio); }
2823  void setLayoutAspectMultiplier(double multiplier)
2824  { CTreeMapNode_setLayoutAspectMultiplier(ptr, multiplier); }
2825  void setSorting(int mode)
2826  { CTreeMapNode_setSorting(ptr, mode); }
2827 
2828  TreeMapNode *getNode(int i)
2829  { TreeMapNodeInternal *p = CTreeMapNode_getNode(ptr, i); if (!p) return 0;
2830  TreeMapNode *ret = new TreeMapNode(p); reg(ret); return ret; }
2831  int getNodeCount() const
2832  { return CTreeMapNode_getNodeCount(ptr); }
2833  double getValue() const
2834  { return CTreeMapNode_getValue(ptr); }
2835  const char *getLabel() const
2836  { return CTreeMapNode_getLabel(ptr); }
2837 
2838  int getLeftX() const
2839  { return CTreeMapNode_getLeftX(ptr); }
2840  int getTopY() const
2841  { return CTreeMapNode_getTopY(ptr); }
2842  int getWidth() const
2843  { return CTreeMapNode_getWidth(ptr); }
2844  int getHeight() const
2845  { return CTreeMapNode_getHeight(ptr); }
2846  int getRightX() const
2847  { return CTreeMapNode_getRightX(ptr); }
2848  int getBottomY() const
2849  { return CTreeMapNode_getBottomY(ptr); }
2850 
2851  void setPos(int x, int y, int w, int h)
2852  { CTreeMapNode_setPos(ptr, x, y, w, h); }
2853 };

2924  { MeterPointer *ret = new MeterPointer(CBaseMeter_addPointer(ptr, value, fillColor, edgeColor)); reg(ret); return ret; }

2927  { CBaseMeter_setScale(ptr, lowerLimit, upperLimit, majorTickInc, minorTickInc, microTickInc); }

2979  double startAngle = Chart::NoValue, double endAngle = Chart::NoValue)

2988  double backRadiusRatio = Chart::NoValue, double frontRadiusRatio = Chart::NoValue, double frontEdgeWidthRatio = Chart::NoValue)
2989  { CAngularMeter_setCap2(ptr, backColor, frontColor, frontEdgeColor, lightingRatio, backRadiusRatio, frontRadiusRatio, frontEdgeWidthRatio); }
2990  MeterPointer *addPointer2(double value, int fillColor, int edgeColor = -1, int pointerType = Chart::TriangularPointer2,
2991  double startOffset = Chart::NoValue, double endOffset = Chart::NoValue, double widthRatio = Chart::NoValue)
2992  { MeterPointer *ret = new MeterPointer(CAngularMeter_addPointer2(ptr, value, fillColor, edgeColor, pointerType,
2993  startOffset, endOffset, widthRatio)); reg(ret); return ret; }

2996  { CAngularMeter_addZone(ptr, startValue, endValue, startRadius, endRadius, fillColor, edgeColor); }
2997  void addZone(double startValue, double endValue, int fillColor, int edgeColor = -1)
2998  { CAngularMeter_addZone2(ptr, startValue, endValue, fillColor, edgeColor); }
2999 
3000  int relativeRadialGradient(DoubleArray gradient, double radius = -1)
3001  { return CAngularMeter_relativeRadialGradient(ptr, gradient.data, gradient.len, radius); }
3002  int relativeLinearGradient(DoubleArray gradient, double angle = 0, double radius = -1)
3003  { return CAngularMeter_relativeLinearGradient(ptr, gradient.data, gradient.len, angle, radius); }

3023  { CLinearMeter_setMeter(ptr, leftX, topY, width, height, axisPos, isReversed); }

3029  int getMeterWidth() { return CLinearMeter_getMeterWidth(ptr); }
3030  int getMeterHeight() { return CLinearMeter_getMeterHeight(ptr); }
3031  int getMeterRightX() { return getMeterLeftX() + getMeterWidth(); }
3032  int getMeterBottomY() { return getMeterTopY() + getMeterHeight(); }
3033

3040 
3041 class ArrayMath
3042 {
3043 private :
3044  ArrayMathInternal *ptr;
3045 
3046 public :
3047  ArrayMath(DoubleArray a) : ptr(CArrayMath_create(a.data, a.len)) {}
3048  ~ArrayMath() { CArrayMath_destroy(ptr); }
3049  static ArrayMath *create(DoubleArray a) { return new ArrayMath(a); }
3050  void destroy() { delete this; }
3051 
3052  ArrayMath(const ArrayMath &rhs) { DoubleArray r = rhs; ptr = CArrayMath_create(r.data, r.len); }
3053  ArrayMath &operator=(const ArrayMath &rhs) { CArrayMath_destroy(ptr); DoubleArray r = rhs; ptr = CArrayMath_create(r.data, r.len); return *this;}
3054  operator DoubleArray() const { return result(); }
3055 
3056  ArrayMath& add(DoubleArray b) { CArrayMath_add(ptr, b.data, b.len); return *this; }
3057  ArrayMath& add(double b) { CArrayMath_add2(ptr, b); return *this; }
3058  ArrayMath& sub(DoubleArray b) { CArrayMath_sub(ptr, b.data, b.len); return *this; }
3059  ArrayMath& sub(double b) { CArrayMath_sub2(ptr, b); return *this; }
3060  ArrayMath& mul(DoubleArray b) { CArrayMath_mul(ptr, b.data, b.len); return *this; }
3061  ArrayMath& mul(double b) { CArrayMath_mul2(ptr, b); return *this; }
3062  ArrayMath& div(DoubleArray b) { CArrayMath_div(ptr, b.data, b.len); return *this; }
3063  ArrayMath& div(double b) { CArrayMath_div2(ptr, b); return *this; }
3064  ArrayMath& financeDiv(DoubleArray b, double zeroByZeroValue) { CArrayMath_financeDiv(ptr, b.data, b.len, zeroByZeroValue); return *this; }
3065  ArrayMath& shift(int offset = 1, double fillValue = Chart::NoValue) { CArrayMath_shift(ptr, offset, fillValue); return *this; }
3066  ArrayMath& delta(int offset = 1) { CArrayMath_delta(ptr, offset); return *this; }
3067  ArrayMath& rate(int offset = 1) { CArrayMath_rate(ptr, offset); return *this; }
3068  ArrayMath& abs() { CArrayMath_abs(ptr); return *this; }
3069  ArrayMath& acc() { CArrayMath_acc(ptr); return *this; }
3070 
3071  ArrayMath& selectGTZ(DoubleArray decisionArray = DoubleArray(), double fillValue = 0)
3072  { CArrayMath_selectGTZ(ptr, decisionArray.data, decisionArray.len, fillValue); return *this; }
3073  ArrayMath& selectGEZ(DoubleArray decisionArray = DoubleArray(), double fillValue = 0)
3074  { CArrayMath_selectGEZ(ptr, decisionArray.data, decisionArray.len, fillValue); return *this; }
3075  ArrayMath& selectLTZ(DoubleArray decisionArray = DoubleArray(), double fillValue = 0)
3076  { CArrayMath_selectLTZ(ptr, decisionArray.data, decisionArray.len, fillValue); return *this; }
3077  ArrayMath& selectLEZ(DoubleArray decisionArray = DoubleArray(), double fillValue = 0)
3078  { CArrayMath_selectLEZ(ptr, decisionArray.data, decisionArray.len, fillValue); return *this; }
3079  ArrayMath& selectEQZ(DoubleArray decisionArray = DoubleArray(), double fillValue = 0)
3080  { CArrayMath_selectEQZ(ptr, decisionArray.data, decisionArray.len, fillValue); return *this; }
3081  ArrayMath& selectNEZ(DoubleArray decisionArray = DoubleArray(), double fillValue = 0)
3082  { CArrayMath_selectNEZ(ptr, decisionArray.data, decisionArray.len, fillValue); return *this; }
3083 
3084  ArrayMath& selectStartOfSecond(int majorTickStep = 1, double initialMargin = 0.1)
3085  { CArrayMath_selectStartOfSecond(ptr, majorTickStep, initialMargin); return *this; }
3086  ArrayMath& selectStartOfMinute(int majorTickStep = 1, double initialMargin = 5)
3087  { CArrayMath_selectStartOfMinute(ptr, majorTickStep, initialMargin); return *this; }
3088  ArrayMath& selectStartOfHour(int majorTickStep = 1, double initialMargin = 300)
3089  { CArrayMath_selectStartOfHour(ptr, majorTickStep, initialMargin); return *this; }
3090  ArrayMath& selectStartOfDay(int majorTickStep = 1, double initialMargin = 3 * 3600)
3091  { CArrayMath_selectStartOfDay(ptr, majorTickStep, initialMargin); return *this; }
3092  ArrayMath& selectStartOfWeek(int majorTickStep = 1, double initialMargin = 2 * 86400)
3093  { CArrayMath_selectStartOfWeek(ptr, majorTickStep, initialMargin); return *this; }
3094  ArrayMath& selectStartOfMonth(int majorTickStep = 1, double initialMargin = 5 * 86400)
3095  { CArrayMath_selectStartOfMonth(ptr, majorTickStep, initialMargin); return *this; }
3096  ArrayMath& selectStartOfYear(int majorTickStep = 1, double initialMargin = 60 * 86400)
3097  { CArrayMath_selectStartOfYear(ptr, majorTickStep, initialMargin); return *this; }
3098  ArrayMath& selectRegularSpacing(int majorTickStep, int minorTickStep = 0, int initialMargin = 0)
3099  { CArrayMath_selectRegularSpacing(ptr, majorTickStep, minorTickStep, initialMargin); return *this; }
3100 
3101  ArrayMath& trim(int startIndex = 0, int len = -1)
3102  { CArrayMath_trim(ptr, startIndex, len); return *this; }
3103  ArrayMath& insert(DoubleArray a, int insertPoint = -1)
3104  { CArrayMath_insert(ptr, a.data, a.len, insertPoint); return *this; }
3105  ArrayMath& insert(double c, int len, int insertPoint = -1)
3106  { CArrayMath_insert2(ptr, c, len, insertPoint); return *this; }

3108  { CArrayMath_replace(ptr, a, b); return *this; }

3129  { CArrayMath_lowess2(ptr, b.data, b.len, smoothness, iteration); return *this; }
3130 
3131  DoubleArray result() const { const double *d; int len; CArrayMath_result(ptr, &d, &len); return DoubleArray(d, len); }
3132 #ifndef max
3133  double max() const { return CArrayMath_max(ptr); }
3134 #endif
3135  double maxValue() const { return CArrayMath_max(ptr); }

3144  double percentile(double p) const { return CArrayMath_percentile(ptr, p); }

3149  { const double *d; int len; CArrayMath_aggregate(ptr, srcArray.data, srcArray.len, aggregateMethod, param,
3150  &d, &len); return DoubleArray(d, len); }
